story:
Short Summary

I am Carmen Braden, a composer and performer in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. After years of musical creation and exploration, I have a boatful of beautiful music that wants to get recorded, and this is the year to do it! The album will include a balance of lyrical folk music and edgy, enchanting chamber music.

Why am I bringing together these two kinds of music? Why put a love song beside a piano trio about candle ice? or an adventure song beside a string quartet about ravens? Because these are the kinds of music that I love to write. And my songs and chamber works both do the same thing even though they may do it in different ways: they reflect the beauty I experience in the north and in life itself. 

One important part of this project is that I will record the album in the North alongside amazing and talented artists from the NWT. I will be singing and playing piano, and the instruments featured in the chamber works will also sound in the songs. The strength of this album will come from all the different components having the same core elements: the inspiration, the instrumentation, the players, the composer, and of course, the themes: beauty, curiosity, and the north.

Where the money goes, and what comes back to you

This project is a big one, and many challenges come with doing a major artistic undertaking in the NWT. My crowdfunding campaign is supplying about 12% of the funds needed - and it's an essential source to get this project off the ground! The funds raised here will support the recording phase of the album: guest musicians fees, and the costs of working with a fabulous producer and recording engineer. If you contribute and the crowdfunding campaign reach $7,200, don't worry, the funds raised will be put to use toward the project. This is a healthy budget, and includes everything from video production to professional rates for all the artists to marketing and design. I'm accessing government grants, sponsorship, in-kind support, personal investment, and straight up fundraising like this. With your help, I will be able to get this recording into the air and off to an exciting start!

To get you in the swing of things, I have perks with each support level. These include advance digital copies of the album, composition lessons, a read-through and analysis of the scores, guided soundwalks, accompanying an ice-recording session, personalized house concerts, etc. Even the chance to give me a topic / help with a lyric for a brand new song dedicated to you or someone you love...


The Drive


Beauty, curiosity, deep listening, and careful sound-making - these drive my art. I love listening to the sub-Arctic soundscape, exploring it with all of my senses, then bringing it bedrock-deep into my music. I was born and raised in the north. I'm living in my hometown of Yellowknife, working as a full-time musician after finishing my Masters in Music in Composition at the University of Calgary. I love making music with my community: teaching, conducting, performing and learning. And I love music-making outside my community: sharing, engaging, and building relationships. All of these things come will be part of this album. 

This project is valuable to the whole northern community for several reasons. It will engage with local musicians who will give strong artistic performances, and we will all experience growth and development through the creation process of the album.. It will showcase the music of the north. And maybe it will inspire more curiosity and explorations of beauty from others. There aren't many northern composers who have written music from the north, although there is a great deal of music written about the north. It's time for this perspective to be heard. 

My music has been performed live many times in the north and across Canada by fantastic performers - the Gryphon Trio, Aurora Chorealis, the Elmer Iseler Singers, GroundSwell, Land's End Ensemble, the Whitehorse Community Choir, the Penderecki Quartet... By listening to these players (and many others!) I've discovered that the best music comes from building relationships. By listening to my teachers, I've learned to listen to my ear and my heart. And by listening to the world around me, I can testify that there will always be more beauty to explore.


The Plan

I plan to record the album in the early-mid summer, and have all the production work done in time for a November release. This crowdfunding campaign will support the pre-production costs this project. Other funding sources will include giving house-concerts as fundraisers, applying for grants from Canada Council and other arts-supporting organizations, getting in-kind donations from local business (some already confirmed!) and putting in my own sweat equity (definitely confirmed). There is a chance that if some of my grants don't come through, then the scope of the album will have to be altered to be fair to the music and musicians.  Two things I will not sacrifice are paying professional rates to artists, and achieving the highest quality recordings I can.  Within these wonderful limits, I'm committed to getting my music out there!

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for any support you can give! Please help to spread the word about this album and about the crowdfunding campaign. 

And keep up your own curiosity for the beautiful.

And I love music-making outside my community: sharing, engaging, and building relationships. All of these things come will be part of this album. 

This project is valuable to the whole northern community for several reasons. It will engage with local musicians who will give strong artistic performances, and we will all experience growth and development through the creation process of the album.. It will showcase the music of the north. And maybe it will inspire more curiosity and explorations of beauty from others. There aren't many northern composers who have written music from the north, although there is a great deal of music written about the north. It's time for this perspective to be heard. 
My music has been performed live many times in the north and across Canada by fantastic performers - the Gryphon Trio, Aurora Chorealis, the Elmer Iseler Singers, GroundSwell, Land's End Ensemble, the Whitehorse Community Choir, the Penderecki Quartet... By listening to these players (and many others!) I've discovered that the best music comes from building relationships. By listening to my teachers, I've learned to listen to my ear and my heart. And by listening to the world around me, I can testify that there will always be more beauty to explore.

The Plan

 I plan to record the album in the early-mid summer, and have all the production work done in time for a November release. This crowdfunding campaign will support the pre-production costs this project. Other funding sources will include giving house-concerts as fundraisers, applying for grants from Canada Council and other arts-supporting organizations, getting in-kind donations from local business (some already confirmed!) and putting in my own sweat equity (definitely confirmed). There is a chance that if some of my grants don't come through, then the scope of the album will have to be altered to be fair to the music and musicians.  Two things I will not sacrifice are paying professional rates to artists, and achieving the highest quality recordings I can.  Within these wonderful limits, I'm committed to getting my music out there!
Other Ways You Can Help
 Thank you for any support you can give! Please help to spread the word about this album and about the crowdfunding campaign. 
And keep up your own curiosity for the beautiful.

story:
Short Summary

I'm just a regular guy working on some music under the name Laurel Bluffs. I've recorded 10 songs and they're ready to be mixed and mastered. I've spent a whole lot of hours making these songs. When you're not a super cool snowboarder, what else do you do in the dreary cold Autumn and Winter months? I was excited about Summer so a lot of the songs make you wanna eat a sandwich and dance in your backyard. Some of them are sad too. Winter can be a sad time. It's Summer now though so don't get down. 
So, I need your help. As an educator working with high school special needs students my salary doesn't cut it when it comes to the post production costs. Don't worry mom I get 3 square meals a day. Sandwiches are mostly square. 
By pre-ordering the album you'll be helping me get these songs out there into the ears of music listeners and YOU get an early digital download. 

This project is a lot different musically from what Anna and I have been doing publicly with the other group I'm in, Old Hours. On this album, I'm doing it all. I'm talking about vocals, guitar, bass, keys, drums, ambient noise, production. Except for a kick ass guitar solo by Jason Richard. It kills. 

This album will make you want to: Dance in the kitchen, dance in an elevator, dance alone, drive late into the night and cry, dance with friends and their pets, dance with strangers and cry together in an elevator. Solidarity. Whole lotta dancing and crying if it takes you there.  

What We Need & What You Get

You get a pre-order/early release digital download of the album. That's pretty chill. 

Risks & Challenges

It's quite a challenge but I'm willing to risk it all. My life is on the line here. My life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hide your kids, hide your lover, hide your friends, hide your neighbors and enemies. After they're hidden away show them this page and tell them life is gonna be okay. High-fives too, I'm always down for high-fives. Sprouts sandwiches are pretty killer too. Turkey and provolone on sourdough with every topping available.

story:
Help Fund The Sandy Tar String Band's Summer 2014 West Coast Tour 

Formerly known as Hunnabee & the Sandy Tar Boys, we (The Sandy Tar String Band) are a bluegrass and old time group based out of Athens, OH. Over the past couple of years since the band's inception we've been recording, performing, and traveling relentlessly, building a name for ourselves in the burgeoning folk scene of Athens and the surrounding region and bringing our unique take on traditional old time and bluegrass music (with classical and jazz undertones) to bars, festivals, dances, and more, whenever humanly possible. But after a small group of busy students and post-grads manages to cram well over 100 shows, four album and EP releases, and four proper tours (including one three-month sprawl throughout Europe) into a just-over-two-year span, you'd think we would have had enough, right?

Not so! With a new lineup, a new EP, and a slick new full-length album coming this May, The Sandy Tar String Band have only just begun our renewed project of bringing what we feel is a refreshing and revitalizing take on traditional American music to the world. The past seven months of hard work since our last major excursion will be culminating in a week-long tour of the U.S. West Coast at the end of May. At this time, the group will be playing nightly gigs throughout Washington, Oregon, and northern California (almost all dates are secured!) and bringing glorious music to every possible street corner along the way. Sounds groovy, right?

Well, the unfortunate thing is that going on tour these days can be more costly than ever before--and when you break it down, the price of bringing your music to across the country can seem more than a little daunting. We're currently budgeting for:

  • Airfare (~$1200 total)
  • Transportation (~800 for van rental)
  • Instrument/equipment rental (add ~$150 to rent a bass)
  • Fuel and food

As you can see, without even taking into account the outrageous cost of a tank of gasoline, we'll be forking over more than $2000 just to get this show started. As you can also see, our funding goal for this campaign is still not quite enough to pay those preliminary dues. We're asking you--our fans, families, friends, and foes--to help us cover just a part of the known costs of and undertaking like this, and we're confident that profits from the gigging, busking, and merch-slinging with which we've been so successful on previous tours will cover the rest.

Though The Sandy Tar String Band will be hitting the road regardless of how much we ultimately raise, every donation made still impacts our success while on tour, and therefore greatly impacts our ability to continue making music in future years. Furthermore, every dollar raised beyond our stated goal will continue to go toward funding the journey (and keeping us thinking of creative ways to show our appreciation). As such, if you know us, like us, love us, enjoy what we create, have found yourself dancing at one of our shows, or just really like traditional music, please consider giving us a hand. We've come up with some novel ways of rewarding and connecting with those of you who help make this possible, so have yourself a look, donate if you can, and if you can't, please pass this page along.

Thank you for your support, and we'll see you out there!

--Sandy Tar

story:
Hello, and thank you in advance for visiting our Campaign and expressing an interest in supporting local arts! We are Nate & Stephanie Esau and together form the musical duo Coalmont. We are musicians and storytellers and are passionate about local music reaching the masses!

Giving to our campaign will allow us to go that much further! Your generous gift will help fund a professional music video as well as allow us to release to radio! We are so excited about the doors that this campaign could open and are thrilled that you would like to join on this journey with us. Thank You!


What we need & What you get:

We are looking to raise $4500 for our campaign:

$2000- This amount is needed for radio promotions to get our music on the air!

$1500- Music Video Release- This would allow us to film a music video which in turn would give us a broader fan base, as well as open up many more opportunities to get into festivals and other prime venues.

$1000-Other Marketing & Promotions with the possibility of a tour to support the radio & video release.

Wanna know what you get in return for so generously supporting us? Check out our perks! There is a level to fit every budget, from a sneak preview of the music video to the "Golden Ticket" which gets you concert entry for LIFE, to physically BEING IN THE MUSIC VIDEO! There is something for everyone who would like to partner with us on this journey! We are so excited to have you along!

At the end of the day, we strongly feel that music is THE universal language which has the power to connect us all together. We are determined to reach as far and wide in the world as we can, and need your help, support & partnership to reach these goals. All along, we have felt so much love & support from all our our friends family and most importantly fans. Thank you so much for walking this road with us, we wouldn't have made it this far without all of you.

Now let's get this campaign started!

story:
Who is Van Go Go?

Hello there. We are Van Go Go, a collaborative of musicians with and without developmental disabilities. The musical arm of Chicago based non-profit The Arts of Life, we have met every week for the past two years to write and rehearse songs that are infused with a warm blend of reggae, roots rock, and funk. Our lyrical hooks and dance grooves are bound to stick in your frontal lobe making your feet do things you thought only James Brown was capable of. Coming from a community of musicians that is often marginalized rather than embraced for their unique contributions, these songs seek to deliver a sense of empowerment and enrichment to the human experience. Drummer and singer Nikole Heusman says it best:

“Our music makes me feel like I can do something that frees me from my disability. Our music is for your heart and for your soul.”

Together we have written over a dozen original songs such as Monster Man, Bad Girls, Time Machine, and Danger to Society (Sometimes). We have the music. We have the ambition. Now all we need is YOU!

How can you help?

We really need your support to make this happen. We are extremely proud and fortunate to have volunteers and musicians work with our band, however our needs go beyond just time and diligence. We have set our eyes and hearts on one of Chicago’s premier recording studios and they are eager to begin working with us. To make this happen, we need to raise $5,000 in 30 days so we can fully record, produce, mix, master, and release our album. With your support, we anticipate a late summer to early fall release of the album. Just take it from singer and songwriter Russell Copenharve:

“It's important to us, so we can stick together. We need money to pay for everything.”

We are asking you to join us in this unforgettable experience. Any donation, no matter how large or small, makes a difference. Your ongoing support makes our success possible and now we need your help to move forward. And of course, in proper Indiegogo style, we have some fantastic perks as our way of saying “thank you” for your support.

What if we don’t reach our goal?

While we are hopeful to reach our goal, every dollar donated will be put towards taking this project as far as it can go.  Whatever the outcome, it will be a promising experience for our band to live out the dream of recording our first studio album. The best part of it? You helped make it happen!

story:
About "Terra"

Terra is an album of 11 songs plus a bonus track, produced by Sascha Paeth and Miro Rodenberg and recorded at The Gate Studio in Wolfsburg and at SandLane Studio in the Netherlands.

The songs of “Terra” have been written by Sascha Paeth and Miro Rosenberg (Avantasia), Mark Jansen (Epica), my brother Roberto Macrì, Joris Van de Kerkof and me.

This album is a dream coming true, I can finally put my whole heart and soul in the lyrics. I can use my voice in a way that really fits my personality. The lyrics were inspired by personal experiences: about friendship, grief and also some deeper philosophical themes.

 

What I Need & What You Get

What I need now is your personal support, I need you to believe in me and in this project.

The songs have already been recorded. I need your help to press the album and promote it in the best way possible.

I truly believe that with all your help we can make it happen!

You can support this project choosing between several goodies, you will have the chance to get the album before everyone else.

If you want to have an impression you can check the videos at the top of the page!

You could also get your hands on some special products like the wine that we produce in Sicily from our own vineyard:

 

or signed CD plus some home made almonds:

You can also get a beautiful drawing specially made for this campaign by the super talented artist Val:

or some of my stage accessories: 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have funds to contribute but would still like to help, please tell all of your friends that this campaign is running and just spread the word all over the place!

Feel free to share the campaign, and/or campaign videos, on your social media channels also by using the Indiegogo share tools.

I want to thank you all from the bottom of my hearth for the support you gave me during all these years and i hope you will support my campaign, with your help we can reach the goal to finally release that album!

 

 

 

Very truly yours,

Laura

story:
"Being able to use one USB-C AC adapter and one cable to charge all three devices at the same time really simplifies things for everyday use and especially for travel." - Gadgeteer

 

iTablet | iFMARS Magic Cable: First 100W 3 in 1 Cable for Apple Devices

 

Kawai Koji |  Apple製品に特化した高速充電ケーブル！iFMARSを紹介。

If you're an Apple fan, chances are you have a drawer filled with white cables and adapters for charging your various devices, or a desk or nightstand littered with cables for connecting your MacBook, iPad, iPhone, AirPods and Apple Watch.

The Magic Cable is an idea that's been in the works since 2019. We foresee that smart devices will become popular and the fast-charging PD technology will be widely available. 

We start up with a small team to bring out an efficient and eco-friendly way to power the latest Apple devices. We hope it can charge different types of devices simply and reduce the purchasing of extra adapters and cables. Eventually, here comes our amazing Magic Cable.

Magic Cable is the next generation multi-charging cable for trendy USB-C laptop and Apple devices. It ingeniously utilizes your stock USB-C laptop charger and can power up to 3 devices with varied connectors. 

When you connect and charge your smart devices, Magic Cable will intelligently recognize and power them as fast as possible with patented Smart Power Distribution Algorithms. It is the ultimate solution for charging your Apple devices and others.

With the stock USB-C laptop charger, Magic Cable provides the ability to quick charge a laptop or a tablet (MacBook Pro, iPad Pro), a smartphone (iPhone), and a mobile device (AirPods, Apple Watch*) all at the same time.

 

When Magic Cable powers multiple devices, it provides up to 80W power for MacBook Pro 16” and 15W power left for the remaining 2 devices, with free stock Apple 96W Power Adapter

Magic Cable is designed to make full use of your existing USB-C power adapter as well as to produce less cables for environmental friendliness. So you don't need to buy extra USB-C power adapter and extra cable for new iPhone or new Android smartphone.

Magic Cable is the first multi-charging cable capable of charging 1 laptop and other 2 devices at the same time. It’s the next generation multi-charging cable for trendy USB-C laptop and smart devices.

Magic Cable supports high-speed charging up to 100W when used with a compatible charger. The built-in E-Marker chip ensures optimal charging performance paired with 100W charger for 16-inch MacBook Pro and other latest USB-C devices.

Magic Cable is capable of intelligently recognizing devices and powering them as fast as possible with patented Smart Power Distribution Algorithms. 

 

Unlike normal multi-charging cables, Magic Cable is built with MCU controller and DC to DC conversion circuit inside which can distribute power as needed to a variety of devices such as laptops, tablets, game consoles, drones, phones, earpods, power banks etc.

Constructed from premium materials, Magic Cable is braided with double nylon to further increase strength and resilience for ultimate durability. The flexible and sturdy strain relief absorbs stress from bending to prevent breakage 

Magic Cable is 6.6ft/2m length with one Velcro strap, allowing for long distance charging at home, in the office or travel on the trip anywhere.

You are no longer carrying a bunch of different cables to charge your devices. Magic Cable is built with USB-C, Lightning, Micro-USB connectors and detachable apple watch charger which can almost charge all your devices on daily movement. 

Magic Cable series have 3 types of combination of different connectors that can fulfill all your charging needs for varied devices.

To quick charge your latest smart devices, Magic Cable supports Multi Fast Charging protocols (PD3.0, PPS, QC3.0, etc) that can automatically adapt according to your devices.

To help Magic Cable charge all Apple devices, we especially designed this portable magnetic charger for Apple Watch with Lightning input port. 

With the built-in latest magnetic adsorption module and intelligent chip, it can charge Apple Watch immediately after contact. You can carry this compact portable charger out easier rather than taking the long and oversized charger dock. It is the best companion for Magic Cable to charge all your Apple devices when travel on the trip.

To help Magic Cable charge all Apple devices, we especially designed this portable magnetic charger for Apple Watch with Lightning input port. 

With the built-in latest magnetic adsorption module and intelligent chip, it can charge Apple Watch immediately after contact. You can carry this compact portable charger out easier rather than taking the long and oversized charger dock. It is the best companion for Magic Cable to charge all your Apple devices when travel on the trip.

story:
Apple introduced the reinvented MagSafe technology for iPhone 12 models, which has upgraded the way to wireless charge an iPhone. Yes, it’s undeniable, the iPhone 12 series is one of the best smartphones around, and MagSafe technology has also added a brand new and exciting charging experience. But it's still not perfect, for instance:

- iPhone 12 adopts the next-generation MagSafe wireless charging, but the way you charge it when you go out is old-fashioned.     

 - You can only charge iPhone 12 by laying it down on the MagSafe charger.

- You have to buy an additional stand to hold your iPhone during video chatting, but only with limited angles.        

MagSafe technology opens up the door for a whole new ecosystem of the accessories that work with the iPhone 12 models. 

We wanted to make a revolutionary innovation which brings more fun and convenience to the iPhone 12 series. So, we created MagPal. Specially designed for the iPhone 12 series, MagPal allows you to charge your iPhone 12 without the hassle of wires, while also allowing you to hold it in multiple angles. You'll never want to go back to cords again!    

MagPal is not only a perfect companion for the iPhone 12, but also a versatile wireless power bank that can do more and work with your other devices while on the go.  

Taking full advantage of MagSafe technology, MagPal works seamlessly with the iPhone 12 (Pro/Pro Max). Simply click the power button and snap MagPal onto the back of your iPhone 12 with perfect alignment every time, then you can get a quick and reliable power boost (7.5W high-speed magnetic wireless charging) that doesn’t block your camera while you’re on-the-go. No need for cables or precise placement. You can also enjoy total freedom with effortless detachment. Just ditch the cables and enjoy magnetic wireless charging for iPhone 12 series.        

Note: Please click the power button to activate wireless charging. 

MagPal comes with strong N52 magnets that lock onto the built-in magnets of iPhone 12 to provide a secure hold. No need to worry about power failure when charging your iPhone 12 with MagPal in your bag. 

No need to sacrifice style over substance as long as your iPhone 12 has a Magsafe-compatible case. Simply snap your iPhone 12 onto the charging pad and enjoy the effortless charging experience.    

 

Simply attach the magnetic sticker to the back of your enabled wireless charging smartphone, then you can enjoy convenient wireless magnetic charging with MagPal. (You can purchase MagSticker as an add on.)    

MagPal helps prevent an awkward cable from interrupting your grip. You can always enjoy a smooth and uninterrupted gaming experience.

With the release of iPhone 13 series on 14th Sep, it's proved that iPhone 13 models still adopt Magsafe technology. So MagPal can definitely work with the iPhone 13 series. With MagPal's future-proof design, you do not need to buy additional charging device for your new iPhone.

Equipped with a built-in wireless fast charger on the front cover, MagPal delivers a powerfully fast energy to go（10W Max). MagPal is compatible with all Qi enabled devices. It can fast charge your AirPods, supported iPhone and Android devices at 5W, 7.5W and 10W power, respectively. Internal circuitry will automatically detect how much wattage your devices require, so there’s no risk of damage. Simply place your device on MagPal’s cover and experience the convenience of true cable-free wireless charging.

Equipped with a 18W PD Type-C port, MagPal can fast charge two devices simultaneously by utilizing both the wired and wireless options. MagPal will charge your iPhone 12 from zero to 50% in just 30 minutes through wired charging. It takes about 2 hours for MagPal to become fully charged.  

Recommended: 20W or higher USB-C Power Adapter

MagPal’s reliable 5,000mAh battery holds its charge for when you need power most. MagPal is perfect for everyday use, which is able to give the iPhone 12 Pro almost a full charge or the biggest iPhone 12 Pro Max an 80% boost.    

As you accumulate more devices with different charging methods, what you really need is one MagPal for the lot.

 

Wireless charging in a power bank isn’t exactly a new idea, but we have made MagPal double as a charging stand as well. A foldable and adjustable kickstand on the back keeps it securely propped up while it’s in use and also supports your iPhone 12 at a comfortable viewing angle according to your different needs. 

The kickstand is made of four magnets and can be adjusted to two angles. The structure of MagPal kickstand is eligible for the protection under a utility model patent.

Video conferencing has become more normal than going to office during quarantine period. It would be embarrassing if your iPhone 12 runs out of power during an important video chat. With MagPal, you can take the video meeting with hands-free ease and keep your phone charged all the time. MagPal is also useful as a source of backup power while enjoying entertainment.

The kickstand is made out of strong magnets and durable leather, so you don’t have to worry about accidentally snapping it off.     

MagPal is equipped with circuitry that supports pass-through charging, allowing you to charge the power bank itself and your device at the same time. The pass-through feature would be very helpful when you do need to go mobile at the last minute, making you well prepared with a fully-charged power bank.      

The compact design is the key to its portability. MagPal is actually only around 68mm long and 17.2mm thick, making it sufficiently small for a pocket or bag.    

MagPal has passed FCC, RoHS 2.0,  and CE’s strict safety standards. MagPal also has eight different types of protections, including overcharge protection, voltage protection, temperature monitoring protection, and more. It gives all-round protections that ensure safety for the device and its users. 

 

Our engineers made a comparison test of charging iPhone 12 (airplane mode) from 0 using MagPal and Apple Magsafe Battery Pack in our lab (77℉). As seen from the below chart, MagPal has a faster charging speed and can fully charge iPhone 12. 

 

Laser Carving 

 

Magnetic Power Comparison (MagPal vs Apple Magsafe Battery Pack) 

 

 

 

 

This is our first time to launch a crowdfunding campaign under our own brand, but we have much experience participating in running several successful Kickstarter campaigns during our past career time. We have built a long-term cooperative relationship with a top manufacturer in China, who also works with famous brands, including TOSHIBA and Mophie. Your strong support will give us the needed affirmation to place a larger raw materials order and start mass production earlier. We will place the finalized order to our manufacturer immediately after the campaign ends in late Oct. The lead time is about 40 working days. Then we can start the shipment in Dec. Due to strict regulations on power banks, we can only ship MagPal to certain countries, including US, Canada, EU, Australia, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong and Macau. We work with a reliable shipping company who offers a door-to-door delivery.  We will keep you posted of our production and shipment updates.

mobfree is the combination of mobility and freedom. We are a small startup based in China with a concentration on great lifestyle products. We believe that a good design should be simple, compact, and smart. It should also be made with durable and high-quality materials. We have many years’ experience designing and producing consumer electronic products. With experienced product development engineers, project management experts, innovative production processes and secure manufacturing supply chains — we provide you with high-quality products from design to finished product.

story:
INVZI MagHub Won the CES 2022 Innovation Awards Honoree

https://ces.tech/Innovation-Awards/Honorees/2022/Honorees/I/INVZI-MagHub-Pop-Up-SSD-USB-C-Docking-Station.aspx

 

2021 New MacBook Pro 16"/14" Compatible

All-in-One Solution for MacBook

Premium Aluminum Alloy

12-in-2 USB-C Gen 2 Docking Station Up To 4TB

 

INVZI MagHub puts the full power of a workstation within reach for all MacBook users. MagHub optimizes your access to your peripherals and takes charge of every task you undertake on your MacBook.

Rather than relying on faulty mechanical locks, MagHub uses a magnetic lock. This adds to the sleek, sophisticated style that we have adhered to throughout the design process. Both parts of MagHub, the hub and leather backplate, fit right into the MacBook aesthetic. The innovative, patent-pending magnetic design also drastically simplifies the set-up and attachment process.

  

Encased in CNC-precision-milled aluminum, MagHub will stand the test of any lifestyle. We have used premium materials and manufacturing processes to build it, refusing to compromise on quality. It will fit any 13"/15"/16" MacBook perfectly.

Upgrade Your MacBook Pro/Air up to 4TB

The pop-up SSD connects MacBook wirelessly by built-in USB-C male port and can be used independently. To us, "ready" also means convenient: MagHub comes equipped with an SSD enclosure that is compatible with M.2 SATA SSD and NVME SSD, upgrading up to 4TB of memory. It is simple to set up and maintain, and data transfers are fast and safe.

With Up to 1,000MB/s read and write speed, MagHub is compatible with both M.2 NVME 10Gbps and SATA SSD 5Gbps. With up to 4TB of available storage, you will get additional space to save all your media, data, game and program files and effectively boost your computing experience.

MagHub equips M.2 SSD enclosure fitting NVMe PCIe M Key, SATA M Key and SATA B&M Key, applicable to sizes 22x42/ 22x60/ 22x80 solid state memory. Does not support AHCI PCIe SSD M Key and SATA SSD B Key.

The magnetic attachment approach is so dependable, you never need to worry about vibration damage again. Start by removing the release liner of the PU tape, attaching the tape to your MacBook, and placing the MacBook on MagHub. MagHub attracts firmly with each other by strong magnetic force.

MagHub supports dual 4K@60Hz monitors with Display 1: HDMI 2.0 + DP 1.4 and Display 2: HDMI 2.0, allowing resource-demanding applications to run on independent displays without affecting system performance. 

 *Note: MagHub supports TWO extended displays on MacBook Pro and MacBook Air with Intel chip and ONLY Single Display with Apple M1 Chip (M1 MacBook only supports one extend display).

*Note: Because MagHub spends 15W power for SSD and other ports, the power shown in MacBook 16" will be 85W. 

Energy Saving for MacBook Battery

While we want MagHub to represent power, we know that you need to be able to control how it works. It will continue to use the battery as long as you keep it attached – unless you turn it off, a feature that other such devices simply do not offer.

 Add to that the built-in air vents, which dissipate heat while once again striking the same smooth and fashionable look every MacBook user loves.

Temperature Test on MacBook & MagHub

Aluminum Alloy material gives INVZI MagHub a sense of technology and better thermolysis, which ensures a low operating temperature of below 131℉(55℃) even when transferring large amounts of data. Moreover, the thermal insulation tape attached on the MacBook side can also protect your macBook from overheat.

 

Premium Aluminum MagHub is designed for all 13"/15"/16" MacBook. It perfectly fits your MacBook and case friendly Anytime, Anywhere.

  • Pop Up SSD Enclosure: compatible with M.2 PCI-E NVMe & SATA up to 8TB, 1000Mbps high speed, SSD Memory Size: 22x42/22x60/22x80
  • USB-C1: 100W PD fast charging
  • USB-C2: USB 3.2 Gen2 10Gbps
  • USB-C3: USB 3.1 Gen1 5Gbps
  • HDMI 1: Support HDMI2.0, Max 4K/60Hz, HDCP1.4/2.2, MST mode for MacOS with Intel Chip/Windows (MacBook M1 only supports ONE external display)
  • HMDI 2+DP: Support HDMI2.0, Max 4K/60Hz, HDCP1.4/2.2, MST mode for MacOS with Intel Chip/Windows (MacBook M1 only supports ONE external display)
  • Gigabit Ethernet: Support 1Gbps, 100/10Mbps
  • USB-A1: USB 3.2 Gen2 10Gbps
  • USB-A2: USB 3.1 Gen1 5Gbps
  • SD/Micro SD: Support SD/SDHC/SDXC, SD3.0 UHS-I, up to 104MB/S, up to 4TB
  • ON/OFF Switch
  • Material: Aluminum Alloy
  • Color: Space Gray
  • Size: 13”/15”/16”
  • Weight: 10.5 ounces
  • Operating Temperature: Below 131°F (55°C)
  • What’s in the Box: 1 x MagHub with SSD Enclosure, 1 x Magnetic PU Tape
  •  Compatibility: 2021 New MacBook M1 Pro/Max, MacBook Pro 2016-2020(13"/15"/16"), MacBook Air 2018-2020 

Perk Fulfillment, Shipping & Tax

With the continuation of the worldwide pandemic, we need to cover our shipping charges, which are often expensive, especially to countries that are further away.

  • For our backers in the US, we will ship directly from the warehouse in US. Import duty will not become an issue regardless.
  • Our backers in the EU, however, will need to pay a VAT Fee. 
  • For our backers in the rest of the world, additional taxes, duties, and fees may apply, all of which the recipient must pay at the time of delivery. If you decline to pay those charges, the package may be considered abandoned, destroyed, or returned to sender, at an extremely high cost charged to INVZI. Under these circumstances, we cannot consider requests for replacement shipments or refunds.  

From concept, ID, ME, EE to 3D printed models and engineering & design validation test prototypes, we already finished the design stage. We made many prototypes to make sure the perfect MagHub to MacBook lovers. With each new version, we get closer to the USB-C hub revolution.

  • V1 Version: MagHub was designed with MacBook holder and built-in SSD slot.
  • V2 Version: MacBook holder part was deleted.
  • V3-Final Version: MagHub design was changed from the built-in SSD slot to Pop Up SSD enclosure. Added DP port and deleted the audio jack port.

At INVZI, we have committed ourselves to designing top-quality products for MacBooks, iPhones, iPads, and other consumer electronics. We work hard to stay ahead of all the latest trends, the first crowdfunding campaign launched on 2020: World's First ADG 9-in-100W GaN Charger & Hub on Indiegogo. This campaign was successfully funded with $346,666 and 3754 backers. Most of the backers' rewards were fulfilled and received except some backers not confirming their shipping information. Why we change from ADG to INVZI? Because there is some trademark issue with ADG. In 2020, we worked with our legal team and filed a trademark application for the name: ADG in the hub catalog from USPTO. Until now the trademark- ADG is still under USPTO's review. In order to provide legal brand name, we’ve decided to use new trademark: INVZI instead of ADG from July, 2021. So the product formerly known as ADG will transfer to trademark INVZI. This time we use INVZI for this new amazing MagHub. With the experience of previous campaign, we have confidence that we can make the MagHub real and deliver to all the backers worldwide.

That was a major step for us, and since then, we have continued to adhere to the same creative and engineering mindsets that set us up for success in the first place. When we started designing MagHub, we knew what we wanted: to provide MacBook users an unrivaled workstation, something that would make the MacBook even more useful for students and professionals. It has been a long and challenging process, but we could not be any happier with our product. MagHub is the premier workstation for MacBook, and we're excited for other people to discover that for themselves.

Thank You for Supporting INVZI MagHub

Risks and challenges

There is no such thing as a risk-free campaign. Fortunately, our experience and our insights have prepared us to follow through on our promises. We are confident that we have done the work necessary to avoid any substantial challenges and setbacks. Our Indiegogo campaign was a hit in 2020, and we believe this will be better. In the photos that we have provided, the INVZI MagHub is a fully functional, usable prototype. This product is ready for EVT and DVT, stage and once we raise the funds that we need we will be able to reach economies of scale for mass production, keeping costs low for you.

Fortunately, our experience and our insights have prepared us to follow through on our promises. We are confident that we have done the work necessary to avoid any substantial challenges and setbacks. Our Indiegogo campaign was a hit in 2020, and we believe this will be better. In the photos that we have provided, the INVZI MagHub is a fully functional, usable prototype. This product is ready for EVT and DVT, stage and once we raise the funds that we need we will be able to reach economies of scale for mass production, keeping costs low for you.

story:
We're UZE, a team of passionate creators using the power of AI to design, conceptualize, and make products. We use premium materials to guarantee that everything we make is built to last.

To preorder BOLD, click Back This Project, or scroll on.

 

Earn 15% cashback for helping us spread the word!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


BOLD has two USB–C 100 Watts input and output ports. Two USB–A ports, each can charge at a max speed of 40 Watts. The wireless pads can output 15 Watts for phones and 5 Watts for Apple watches. If you use Samsung watches, check our Stretch Goal.

 

A JOY TO USE – Each port is carefully labeled, and the two USB-C ports can be used for input and output charging. In simple terms, it doesn’t matter which USB-C port you use to charge BOLD, it will work.

 

 

 

Do you want to be "in charge"? Pun intended. BOLD's state-of-the-art LCD screen shows output per port, indicates wireless charging, and of course, the battery percentage remaining.

 

BOLD has a 27,000 mAh battery capacity and uses lithium polymer (LiPo) graphene composite batteries manufactured by Panasonic, guaranteeing quality. LiPo graphene is also longer lasting than old lithium batteries. 

Embrace the future with up to 4x the battery life cycle!

 

 

All major brands, like Apple, Samsung, Huawei, Oppo, One Plus, and devices like GoPro, digital cameras, Nintendo Switch, drones, and basically anything that uses USB charging technology.

 

 

 

The use of Programmable Power Supply (PPS) operating protocol gives BOLD the ability to control voltage and current at a granular level.

BOLD can charge all laptops via any of its 2 USB-C Ports.

We have a line of adapters for Dell, Microsoft Surface, HP, ASUS, Lenovo, ACER, MSI, Samsung, and much more. If your laptop is not listed, contact us… you’ll be surprised.

 

 

BOLD uses pass-through technology, allowing you to charge BOLD while it charges your devices. NEAT!

 

 

BOLD’s wireless pads are covered by tempered glass, making BOLD lighter and allowing it to cool faster. Our tempered glass is impact and scratch-resistant. 

Anywhere life takes you, BOLD won’t let you down.

 

BOLD is made out of top quality aircraft grade anodized Aluminum. As a result, BOLD has excellent heat dissipation qualities and is lighter than traditional power banks.

We've reimagined every way you interact with your devices and added utility, power, and strength. BOLD takes up half the volume of traditional Power Banks; now you can have the highest capacity and output Power Bank without carrying a "brick". 

 

 

 

 

BOLD is approved by all major and minor airlines internationally. The maximum airline safe battery capacity for TSA/EASA is 27,000mAh / 100Wh. Disclaimer: some Asian Airlines such as Air Asia have a maximum of 20,000mAh /74Wh.

 

 

We started by defining the Power Bank capabilities and features. The critical task was how to fit so much power into an easily portable body. Many iterations were necessary to find the perfect balance between battery size, PCB positioning, and an optically appealing design. The global chip shortage notably slowed down our prototyping efforts and forced us to revisit our design time and time again. The final result is the perfect compromise between portability and functionality, and we cannot wait to receive your feedback. 

  

 

 

Ready to preorder? Pick your starting point

Within 14 days of your pledge, you will receive an email from Pledgebox to complete a shipping survey.  Taxes will be collected from backers in EU + EFTA, UK, AU, CA, and SG, as your respective governments impose them.

As of July 1st, 2021 VAT applies from the first €1 of the product's price for products sold from outside the EU to consumers living inside the EU.

As of January 1st, 2021 VAT applies from the first £1 of the product's price to products sold from outside the UK to consumers living inside the UK.

To compensate for the VAT rates/taxes that your respective governments require, the UZE team decided to take a significant hit on shipping charges. Taxes and duties will be charged up-front for backers in EU + EFTA, UK, AU, CA, and SG, where applicable, meaning that the packages will arrive with all duties paid, enabling the best possible shipping experience.

Available only on the survey 

 

 

 

 

We use premium materials and manufacturing processes to build products that last. BOLD and all accessories pass rigorous tests to achieve international certifications of safe use. Our products are tested for: TEMPERATURE, CHARGE/DISCHARGE, DROP, SHAKING HUMIDITY, and STATIC.

We comply with FCC, CE, RoHS, MSDS, and our lightning cables are MFi.

Let us take you onto our journey of how BOLD by UZE came to be. 

In 2019, while on holiday in Europe, we went with friends to the beach. It was meant to be a quick stop and go, the last sunset and the culmination of the trip. We didn't carry much, and little did we expect what was about to happen. The car got stuck in the sand, and we had no charging cables, no Power Banks, and less than 5% battery on each phone. While it was enough to call for help, the phones eventually died, and everybody had to sleep the night in the car, as the towing truck was unable to call nor locate us. The temperature dropped, a blizzard came in, and the next day we had to walk for an hour until we found help. 

 

Little did we know that we would sleep right there

Last Picture of the day

 

Back in warm Miami we bought and tested countless Power Banks and found that all the features we wanted weren't available in one single product so we decided it was time to develop a Power Bank that would be a joy to carry around and that would be able to fast charge all devices, especially phones – cable or not.

Since then almost 2 years have passed, and we are super excited to bring BOLD to Indiegogo after a very successful Kickstarter campaign.

 Capacity: 27000mAh / 100Wh

 Interface:

  •  100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Input: 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/3A, 20V/5A (PPS: 3.3-6V/5A, 3.3-11V/5A)
  •  100W USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 Output: 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/3A, 20V/5A (PPS: 3.3-6V/5A, 3.3-11V/5A)
  •  USB-A 1 Output: Max 5V/4.5A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A, 10V/4A
  •  USB-A 2 Output: QualComm Quick Charge 3.0 18W Max 5V/4.5A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A, 10V/4A                           (A1 + A2 = 40W combined)
  •  Phone Wireless Charger Output : 15W Fast Charge 
  •  Apple Watch Wireless Output: 5W
  •  Maximum Power Output: 260W
  •  Maximum Power Input: 100W
  •  Batteries: 8 x 18650 Panasonic™ Lithium Polymer Graphene Composite Battery Cells
  •  Battery Life Cycles: 2,000
  •  Battery Life: 5 Years
  •  Time to 70% (18,900mAh) from empty: 50 min
  •  Time to full charge from empty: 1 hr 25 min (with 100W input)
  •  DC/DC Input Efficiency: 90%~95% (100W input)
  •  Output Efficiency: 87% ± 5%
  •  Discharge Rate: 5.2mAh per day over 395 days
  •  Device Operating Temperature: -20℃  to 60℃
  •  Safety Protection: Over current/voltage/temperature, short circuit protection
  •  Enclosure: Aircraft-grade Aluminium and PVC
  •  Dimensions: 17.39 x 8.4 x 2.6 (6.85" x 3.3" x 1")
  •  Weight: 510g (1.12lb)
  •  

A note on why we went to Kickstarter and now Indiegogo

We launched products in Kickstarter because it gave us the freedom to run our business exactly how we want. The funds allow us to continue developing products without seeking outside investors. We love what we do and are not beholden to growth goals, revenue targets, or product timelines imposed by others. Instead, we focus on doing what we love: building the best things we can make, fueled by support from the best customers we could ask for.

We cannot wait to get these products into your hands.

story:
Overview

Welcome to Planet Computers’ third project: Astro Slide.

Astro Slide is the first 5G smartphone with a keyboard and is the fastest 5G device announced to date.  Astro's revolutionary RockUp™ slider hinge transforms the powerful 6.39" touchscreen smartphone into a mini laptop, featuring Planet’s signature tactile backlit keyboard.

Astro Slide Is great for emails, messaging, editing documents, making calls and taking snaps. Astro's 5G communications offer fastest upload and download speeds for true productivity on the go.  Astro Slide runs Android 11 OS with a multi-boot option for supporting Linux.  Perfect as your daily driver!
 

Quick Facts

  • First 5G handheld device with full physical keyboard
  • RockUp™ slider hinge mechanism combines all the power of a mini laptop  with the functionality of a smartphone
  • Device features a large AMOLED 6.39" touchscreen display and a 48MP camera
  • Astro runs Android 11 and also supports Linux OSs, with a multi-boot option
  • Big enough to be the only device you need to carry, and small enough to fit in your pocket, it’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your mobile phone and your laptop
     

Media Coverage


 

The Planet story enters a new era...

At Planet Computers, we never stop innovating. Over the past two years, we have delivered our award-winning Gemini PDA and Cosmo Communicator devices to over ten thousand backers, who supported our mission to kickstart a new mobile computing revolution.

The revolution continues as we embrace the latest mobile technologies and trends, coupled with our passion for typing, writing, creating on the go.

We are extending the range of Planet devices with the brand new Astro Slide, our flagship 5G transformer smartphone.Once again, we have listened to our backers, who wanted more power, a large touchscreen always accessible, but also want to easy access to Planet’s signature backlit keyboard - without compromise.

We are fully embracing the power of 5G, and we decided to go “all in” to provide the ultimate 5G keyboard experience on the Astro. To have a smartphone that can transform into a pocket computer with simple thumb action is truly a leap in usability and functionality – great for both work and play.

 

It’s the ultimate in mobile design, power and usability.

Astro Slide is the first of Planet’s transformer smartphones with a large 6.39” touchscreen display.  Featuring Planet’s revolutionary patented RockUp slider hinge, Astro Slide reveals Planet’s signature keyboard at the push of thumb.

The display gently tilts up to the optimal viewing angle transforming Astro into a powerful pocket computer.

 

Astro Slide gives you the freedom to write, create, animate, communicate and be entertained in one familiar form factor.

 

Astro Slide is the first 5G phone device with a keyboard to be announced to date. Powered by MediaTek’s Dimensity 800 chipset with 8 super-fast cores plus advanced GPU and APU processors, it offers twice the performance of other 5G chipsets with significantly reduced power consumption, achieving download speeds of up to 2.39 Gb/s.

 

Astro Slide’s battery will power a user through an entire day of work and play.

Astro Slide also features Wi-Fi , Bluetooth 5,1 and NFC communications and wireless charging. Astro has a 48-megapixel rear facing Sony-sensor camera as well as a front camera for video calling.

 

 

A revolution in design

 

The Astro Slide and its RockUp™ hinge slider mechanism have been designed by Martin Riddiford.

Martin is the inventor of the clamshell mobile device and the designer behind all the Psion and Planet devices to date.


Astro Slide has a truly revolutionary design, offering the convenience of a smartphone, as well as laptop keyboard productivity – beautifully crafted in one device – all of it in the palm of your hand. It’s a no compromise solution and perfect as your daily driver.

Planet’s signature backlit keyboard allows you to comfortably work at night or in dark spaces such as on long plane journeys without the need of external lighting.

 

Key features

We've designed the Astro Slide to have all the features you need:

  • A newly-designed integrated physical backlit keyboard
  • A large 6.39" AMOLED touchscreen display with Gorilla glass
  • A hi-res 48MP rear camera
  • 8GB of RAM and 128GB of Flash storage
  • Fingerprint sensor and smart toggle button for security and control
  • NFC for payment

 

 

Other features of Astro Slide include:

  • Fingerprint sensor
  • 2x Nano SIMs and 1x eSIM 
  • 8GB RAM and 128GB of internal memory
  • a MicroSD slot for additional storage
  • 2 USB-C ports and an audio jack

 

Technical Specification

Below is the full Astro Slide technical specification.

    Astro Slide (Initial Specification)
Network:

Wi-Fi

WiFi 5 2T2R
 

Modem

Dual 5G+4G World-wide modem

3GPP Rel. 15
NSA/SA
DL 2.39Gbps
2CC UL 2.39Gbps
2CC Sub-6GHz
2G / 3G / 4G / 5G Multi-Mode
  VoLTE Compatible
  ViLTE Compatible
  VoWi-Fi Compatible  
  Dual SIM operation Dual Model 5G + 4G
Body: Form Factor RockUp™ Slider / Transformer
  Dimensions 17.24 (W) x 7.65 (D) x 1.78 (H) cm , 1.87 with camera protrusion (H)
  Weight Approx. 300g
  SIM Dual nanoSIM + eSIM chip
Display: Type AMOLED Colour FHD+ (20 : 9)
  Size 6.39 inch
  Resolution 2340x1080, 403 ppi
  Multi Touch Yes
  Protection Scratch resistant Gorilla glass (Corning 3rd gen)
Platform: OS Android 11 OS , Linux OS compatible
  Chipset MediaTek Dimensity 800, MT6873 Octa-Core 5G SoC 
  CPU 4x A77 @ 2.6GHz
4x A55 @ 2.0GHz 
  GPU Arm Mali-G57 MC4 GPU Manhattan 3.0: 52fps
  APU 3rd Generation Quad-core APU 3.0. Up to 2.5TOPS
Memory:

RAM

Card Slot

8GB -  Ultra-fast 4-channel LPDD4x

microSD
  Internal 128 GB
Camera: Rear Camera 48MP + Flash (Sony Sensor)
  Front Camera 13MP
Sound: Speakers Stereo Speakers
  Microphone Integrated ambient Microphone
  3.5mm Jack Yes
Comms: WLAN 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/e/k/r/h 
  Bluetooth v5.1
  GPS AGPS, Glonass, Beidou, Galileo

Band L1 + L5 GNSS
  NFC Yes, including payment
  FM Radio Yes
  USB 2x USB Type C, OTG support, Display Port support (via adapter cable)
Features: Keyboard

Mechanical full keyboard

24 Layouts

Arabic, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Dvorak, Finnish / Swedish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Icelandic, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian / Danish, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swiss, Thai, English UK, English US
 

Charging

 10W Qi Wireless charging + Fast charging
 

Sensors

 Accelerometer, compass, light sensor, gyro, magneto-sensor
  Fingerprint

Buttons		 Finger print sensor on side on/off button

Volume up / down, on/off/lock button with fingerprint sesnor , smart control button
Battery:   LiPo 4000mAh battery 
Misc: Colour Black 

 

Software

 

Astro is designed to run the latest Android 10 OS and all you favourite apps, as well as Linux-based operating systems with a multi-boot option.

You can easily run Microsoft Office for Android apps , such as Word, Excel, Powerpoint and Outlook , as well as Planet’s own PDA software suite including the Agenda calendaring app, Notes app for notetaking and dictation, the Data database app and our email client, Airmail.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are proud of what we have created to date but need your support to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of inventing the transformer smartphone product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.

We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the Android 10 and Linux boot firmware. 

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Astro units claimed as perks will have at least $350 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in March 2021 to Astro backers.

 

Impact

With email and messaging applications such as WhatsApp, Line, WeChat, Skype, LinkedIn and Facebook Messenger, there is a lot of typing required - and having a quality mobile keyboard is a must.  It's no longer just about swiping  or typing on a keyboard, making calls , taking photos or voice control - its about all of these actions!  And we need to be able to make these actions wherever and whenever we want.

In creating Astro Slide, we tried to incorporate many features that will make this device powerful enough to be the only device that you need to carry around with you.

Astro Slide allows you to work in restricted spaces comfortably, on planes on trains, in coffee bars. You can also hold the Astro and use it with ease as a passenger  in the car, standing up or on the bus.

It's the only device you need to carry - and small enough to fit in your pocket.

It’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your smartphone and your laptop.

Perfect as your daily driver!

 

Risks & Challenges

The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 8 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market.

At present, we have an initial prototype of the Astro Slide that we built with our industrial design partners Therefore in the UK. We will be working with our factory in China and our designers in the UK to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the Astro. Having delivered both the Gemini PDA and Cosmo Communicator devices in less than a year we are proud of those achievement, but building any new product is a huge task and is a risky journey. Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in March 2021. We have given this project an extra 2 month to deliver as it is our first 5G device. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Astro's progress.

Our supply chain and factories are already back up and running after the recent shutdown in China, producing more Cosmo Communicators for more recent Cosmo backers and our distributors worldwide. We are of course continuing production and support for Gemini PDA and Cosmo Communicator devices.

 

Stretch Goal

We have introduced a stretch goal to our campaign for the first time.

If we get to €1,000,000 before the end of the campaign, on 9th May, we will create an exclusive Planet Backup system for Astro.  We know many of you don’t like to share your precious data with third parties, so if we reach this milestone you can be assured of a solution exclusive to Planet Computers’ users and be guaranteed that you can back up and restore your data without using a third party cloud solution.  You will be able to back up to an SD card or USB memory stick and we are hoping to offer further options in the future.  The back up will support backing up your Android apps with your data, phone settings and local files.

You can back the Planet Backup Contribution perk to help us reach the stretch goal.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love you to join the Planet Computers' movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it. 

 

Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@planetcom.co.uk) or social media. We would love to hear from you. 

We are also running a referral competition for Astro backers. The top 3 Astro Slide campaign referrers by contributions will be rewarded with prizes as follows: 

We hope that you like the prizes and that you will spread the message. The winning referrer prizes will be sent out after the Astro Slide campaign ends in the first week of June 2020. We will contact the referrers for their choice of keyboard layouts. 

We hope that you like our new device and that you can help us make it a reality.

Stay safe and please support us on Indiegogo!

We are extending the range of Planet devices with the brand new Astro Slide, our flagship 5G transformer smartphone.Once again, we have listened to our backers, who wanted more power, a large touchscreen always accessible, but also want to easy access to Planet’s signature backlit keyboard - without compromise.
We are fully embracing the power of 5G, and we decided to go “all in” to provide the ultimate 5G keyboard experience on the Astro. To have a smartphone that can transform into a pocket computer with simple thumb action is truly a leap in usability and functionality – great for both work and play.

 
It’s the ultimate in mobile design, power and usability.
Astro Slide is the first of Planet’s transformer smartphones with a large 6.39” touchscreen display.  Featuring Planet’s revolutionary patented RockUp slider hinge, Astro Slide reveals Planet’s signature keyboard at the push of thumb.
The display gently tilts up to the optimal viewing angle transforming Astro into a powerful pocket computer.

 
Astro Slide gives you the freedom to write, create, animate, communicate and be entertained in one familiar form factor.

 
Astro Slide is the first 5G phone device with a keyboard to be announced to date. Powered by MediaTek’s Dimensity 800 chipset with 8 super-fast cores plus advanced GPU and APU processors, it offers twice the performance of other 5G chipsets with significantly reduced power consumption, achieving download speeds of up to 2.39 Gb/s.

 
Astro Slide’s battery will power a user through an entire day of work and play.
Astro Slide also features Wi-Fi , Bluetooth 5,1 and NFC communications and wireless charging. Astro has a 48-megapixel rear facing Sony-sensor camera as well as a front camera for video calling.
 
 
A revolution in design
 

The Astro Slide and its RockUp™ hinge slider mechanism have been designed by Martin Riddiford.
Martin is the inventor of the clamshell mobile device and the designer behind all the Psion and Planet devices to date.
Astro Slide has a truly revolutionary design, offering the convenience of a smartphone, as well as laptop keyboard productivity – beautifully crafted in one device – all of it in the palm of your hand. It’s a no compromise solution and perfect as your daily driver.
Planet’s signature backlit keyboard allows you to comfortably work at night or in dark spaces such as on long plane journeys without the need of external lighting.

 
Key features
We've designed the Astro Slide to have all the features you need:

A newly-designed integrated physical backlit keyboard
A large 6.39" AMOLED touchscreen display with Gorilla glass
A hi-res 48MP rear camera
8GB of RAM and 128GB of Flash storage
Fingerprint sensor and smart toggle button for security and control
NFC for payment

 

 
Other features of Astro Slide include:

Fingerprint sensor
2x Nano SIMs and 1x eSIM 
8GB RAM and 128GB of internal memory
a MicroSD slot for additional storage
2 USB-C ports and an audio jack

 

Technical Specification
Below is the full Astro Slide technical specification.


 
 
Astro Slide (Initial Specification)



Network: 
Wi-Fi
WiFi 5 2T2R

Dual 5G+4G World-wide modem

Software
 

Astro is designed to run the latest Android 10 OS and all you favourite apps, as well as Linux-based operating systems with a multi-boot option.

You can easily run Microsoft Office for Android apps , such as Word, Excel, Powerpoint and Outlook , as well as Planet’s own PDA software suite including the Agenda calendaring app, Notes app for notetaking and dictation, the Data database app and our email client, Airmail.

 
What We Need & What You Get
We are proud of what we have created to date but need your support to push it over the line. By supporting us, you will be part of inventing the transformer smartphone product category, which we feel is so lacking in the market at present. We would love you to join us on our journey to bring the product to life.
We aim to raise $200,000 through our crowd funding campaign. Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design phases, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowd fund, and development of the Android 10 and Linux boot firmware. 
As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All Astro units claimed as perks will have at least $350 off the planned retail price. First deliveries now start in March 2021 to Astro backers.

 
Impact
With email and messaging applications such as WhatsApp, Line, WeChat, Skype, LinkedIn and Facebook Messenger, there is a lot of typing required - and having a quality mobile keyboard is a must.  It's no longer just about swiping  or typing on a keyboard, making calls , taking photos or voice control - its about all of these actions!  And we need to be able to make these actions wherever and whenever we want.
In creating Astro Slide, we tried to incorporate many features that will make this device powerful enough to be the only device that you need to carry around with you.
Astro Slide allows you to work in restricted spaces comfortably, on planes on trains, in coffee bars. You can also hold the Astro and use it with ease as a passenger  in the car, standing up or on the bus.
It's the only device you need to carry - and small enough to fit in your pocket.
It’s a true all-in-one replacement for both your smartphone and your laptop.
Perfect as your daily driver!
 
Risks & Challenges
The team behind this campaign and Planet Computers has been involved in successfully delivering 8 funded crowdfunding campaigns. We have expertise in bringing both consumer electronics, hardware and software to market.
At present, we have an initial prototype of the Astro Slide that we built with our industrial design partners Therefore in the UK. We will be working with our factory in China and our designers in the UK to finalise mechanical engineering, PCB and radio electronics for the Astro. Having delivered both the Gemini PDA and Cosmo Communicator devices in less than a year we are proud of those achievement, but building any new product is a huge task and is a risky journey. Our team has experience of delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in March 2021. We have given this project an extra 2 month to deliver as it is our first 5G device. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on Astro's progress.

Our supply chain and factories are already back up and running after the recent shutdown in China, producing more Cosmo Communicators for more recent Cosmo backers and our distributors worldwide. We are of course continuing production and support for Gemini PDA and Cosmo Communicator devices.
 
Stretch Goal
We have introduced a stretch goal to our campaign for the first time.

If we get to €1,000,000 before the end of the campaign, on 9th May, we will create an exclusive Planet Backup system for Astro.  We know many of you don’t like to share your precious data with third parties, so if we reach this milestone you can be assured of a solution exclusive to Planet Computers’ users and be guaranteed that you can back up and restore your data without using a third party cloud solution.  You will be able to back up to an SD card or USB memory stick and we are hoping to offer further options in the future.  The back up will support backing up your Android apps with your data, phone settings and local files.
You can back the Planet Backup Contribution perk to help us reach the stretch goal.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
We would love you to join the Planet Computers' movement. We have set out a wide variety of ways for you, as backer, to help us. Any support, however great or small, is kindly received. As any startup, we will have our hands full trying to get this product to market, and we are super excited about it. 

 
Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would be like having fairy dust sprinkled on us! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@planetcom.co.uk) or social media. We would love to hear from you. 
We are also running a referral competition for Astro backers. The top 3 Astro Slide campaign referrers by contributions will be rewarded with prizes as follows: 

We hope that you like the prizes and that you will spread the message. The winning referrer prizes will be sent out after the Astro Slide campaign ends in the first week of June 2020. We will contact the referrers for their choice of keyboard layouts. 
We hope that you like our new device and that you can help us make it a reality.
Stay safe and please support us on Indiegogo!

story:
Introducing Loop.

We love exploring on our bikes and smartphones let us do it quicker and easier than ever.  But all of the phone holders out there are cheap and bulky plastic holders or need special cases just to work.

In 2020 we created the original Loop Mount. A discreet phone mount to help you navigate and use apps safely but doesn’t compromise the look of your beloved bike. Since then, we’ve been sketching, riding and testing. And now we're back, with the Loop Mount Twist.

 

We listened to your feedback, and now you can use all your favourite phone navigation and training apps in either portrait or landscape mode. We’ve re-engineered the product, so, whatever phone or bike you use, across any route and even over the most challenging terrain, your handset will be secure, allowing you to focus safely on the journey.

 

 

So, What's The Problem? 

We’re all guilty of using our phones en route to navigate, even though we know it's dangerous. Current phone holders on the market are ugly or need special cases just to work.

   

 

By Cyclists, For Cyclists. 

At Loop, we’re cyclists first and foremost, which is why we designed a product that actually looked like it belonged on a bike.   

 

 

Any Phone, Any Bike, Any Journey.

We wanted to make Loop Mount Twist for everyone, whatever their journey or setup.  It works with any mainstream smartphone, bike or bars.  There are a few exceptions, for things like aerobars and military style phone cases.

We designed Loop for every type of journey from road or dutch bikes to bumpy journeys on a gravel bike.  But we don't recommend it for mountain biking, doing jumps or BMX.

 


 

Portrait Mode Is Now Built In.

The feedback we've had most, is, "if only it worked in portrait mode". So, we listened, tested, and created the twist feature. So, whether using google maps, Strava, or any other navigation on your smartphone, the portrait or landscape choice is yours. 

 

3KG Of Grip. 

It’s not just your bike that’s important to us, your phone is too. So, Loop Mount Twist secures it in place with 3kg’s of strong gripping force. Meaning the phone is safe, but not crushed. 

 

 

Built To Last A Lifetime.

This is not a plastic mount. We wanted to make a product that lasted a lifetime. So, we constructed Loop Mount Twist out of metal, using CNC technology, making it strong, whilst considering weight. Its versatility means that, if you change your bike, your Loop Mount Twist can move bikes with you. 

 

 

 

New Add-On Accessories.

**Please note - These Accessories are now available to purchase on completion of your order, at the Backerkit Survey stage. You will not be able to add any to your order at the Indiegogo checkout. 

We hated existing mounts on the market that required you to buy other products, just to make them work (did we mention that?). However, some bikes do have very unique features, so we’ve tried to accommodate this by making accessories to help Loop Mount Twist fit on the most obscure bikes and parts. These are add-on accessories and can be added to your shopping cart at the end.   

 

Our Universal Adapter has a quick release elastomer Strap to help fit stems, oversize bars, square formats or other unusual setups.   Depending on demand we may tweak the design to use o-rings instead of the elastomer strap shown here.  

 

 

Even More Secure.

We've improved and refined some of the detailing to ensure that along with the 3kg grip power, the phone sits securely with these new features.  

. 

 

Compatible With Even More Apps. 

There are many different apps to help you navigate from A to B and equal amounts to help you train and track your fitness and speed progress. With the ability to switch from portrait to landscape we've made sure you can choose how to use your apps to best suit your needs.  

 

Our Journey.

In 2020, the original Loop Mount was born, mainly out of frustration with other options on the market. 

.

We’ve now shipped over 25,000 Mounts 

Helping over 15,000 customers navigate safely

In over 73 countries 

Since shipping the original Loop Mount in 2020,  We've been busy detailing our ideas for the Loop Mount Twist and speaking with our manufacturers throughout, ensuring we can deliver everything with the quality and timeframe we're known for. 

. 

We are significantly more advanced at this stage of the project than we were with the original Loop Mount. Tooling got underway at project kickoff of our Kickstarter campaign, giving us a huge head start. We're confident of shipping our mounts within a few weeks of the end of the campaign, keeping to the timeline stated below, meaning you'll be navigating on your bike using Loop Mount Twist in no time. 
Please note: Shipping is now November, this is due to power shortages in China causing unforseen manufacturing delays. 

Manufacturing. 

Using a trusted manufacturer who not only produced the original Loop Mount but also other projects we have been involved with, means that there is a clear understanding of our needs and expected attention to detail. This relationship we've developed over time speeds up the entire process and they are very much as meticulous as we are. 

 

Our Community. 

But don’t take our word for it.

We have been overwhelmed by the amount of people taking time out to pay the product and speed of service, compliments. We can’t thank you enough.   

 

Specs. 

 Loop Mount Twist comes in Black and Silver.

 

What's In The Box? 

  • 1 x Loop Mount Twist  
  • 2 x screws
  • 3 x Small shim
  • 1 x Medium shim
  • 1 x Large shim
  • 1 x Allen Key

 

Phone Sizes.

Loop opens up to 85mm / 3 3/8" - that is enough for large smart phone in a case. 

 

Handlebar Sizes.

Loop is designed to work on all major handlebar sizes (22.2mm to 31.8mm - that's 7/8" to 1 1/4"). It can also be mounted on your stem if it's tubular (or approximately circular)

 

Rewards.

11 Working Days after placing your order, a Backerkit Survey will be sent to you via email for you to complete your purchase. At this point, you can make final adjustments to your order including choosing the colour of your mount(s). 

 **(Exchange rates correct on date of launch). 

 

Shipping.

We’ve learnt a lot about shipping internationally since our last campaign - our shipping strategy is set out below.

 

What the shipping cost covers - 

Our shipping charge covers the cost of getting your mount from the manufacturer in the Far East, to you wherever you are based in the world. Unfortunately this is more expensive than ordering from an online retailer in your local country, just due to the sheer distance it will travel.

 

Import Costs

For the USA, we’ll either ship direct from our our Hong Kong fulfilment centre or import to a warehouse in the USA and send out from there. Either way import duty is not an issue.

For the EU & UK, we’ll import to locally-based fulfilment centres and distribute from there. Our EU warehouse is in Germany. We may charge a little extra on shipping to help cover the cost of importing.

For Canada and Australia, we plan to ship with duties pre-paid. This is dependant on the prepaid courier services being available at the time of sending so are not able to guarantee this.

For other countries we will endeavour to avoid unnecessary import duties for you but is not always possible.  We’d estimate on our last campaign this wasn’t an issue for over 99% of people.

International shipping, tax and import is very complex and changes all the time, so there is a chance we may have to change this strategy as we get closer to shipping.  

Japan & China

Unfortunately we’re not shipping to Japan or mainland China on this campaign due to licensing restrictions. If you try to order from these countries you’ll find the shipping costs are prohibitively high. Unfortunately this is the only simple way we can restrict these countries on the Indiegogo platform.  

About Us. 

When cycling exploded in popularity during the 2020 lockdown, we knew we wanted to use our industrial design experience to make beautiful, sleek and practical products for this new wave of cyclists.

We're immensely proud of Loop Mount's success. We wanted to raise $30,000 for our original mount, but we raised over $1M in crowdfunding. We really hope Loop Mount Twist will receive the same incredible support.
