story:
Mokibo is a full-size keyboard in which the keyboard surface also functions as a trackpad. Your fingers don't have to leave the keyboard to move the mouse cursor.

 

 

In previous versions of Mokibo 2019, the entire keyboard was a trackpad. With this design, you have to remove the left hand from the keyboard to use the trackpad. With the new Mokibo Folio, only the right side is used as the trackpad. Therefore, you can leave your left hand on the keyboard while using the trackpad with your right hand.

 

 

A precision touch sensor is located under the right half of the keyboard. Our technology automatically distinguishes between keyboard mode and mouse mode so that the mouse does not move while using the keyboard.

 

 

Mokibo uses a pantograph keyboard, which is the most widely used type of keyboard in laptop computers, so it will have a familiar feel--providing comfort and enabling fast typing. The key travel distance is 1.3 to 1.5mm which is the most desirable distance for laptop computers.

 

*Mokibo folio Universal is not a tablet PC keyboard case. It is just a portable keyboard with folio protector. Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" are iPad Pro keyboard case which fit to iPad Pro device. 

 

We successfully crowdfunded our first version of the portable dual function Mokibo keyboard with the integrated trackpad surface in the US, Korea, and Japan and we produced in 2019. Building on the 2019 version, the 2020 Mokibo Folio will feature greatly improved keyboard feel and touch sensitivity.
story_txt:
Mokibo is a full-size keyboard in which the keyboard surface also functions as a trackpad. Your fingers don't have to leave the keyboard to move the mouse cursor.
 

 
In previous versions of Mokibo 2019, the entire keyboard was a trackpad. With this design, you have to remove the left hand from the keyboard to use the trackpad. With the new Mokibo Folio, only the right side is used as the trackpad. Therefore, you can leave your left hand on the keyboard while using the trackpad with your right hand.
 

 

 
A precision touch sensor is located under the right half of the keyboard. Our technology automatically distinguishes between keyboard mode and mouse mode so that the mouse does not move while using the keyboard.
 

 

 
Mokibo uses a pantograph keyboard, which is the most widely used type of keyboard in laptop computers, so it will have a familiar feel--providing comfort and enabling fast typing. The key travel distance is 1.3 to 1.5mm which is the most desirable distance for laptop computers.
 

 
 

 



*Mokibo folio Universal is not a tablet PC keyboard case. It is just a portable keyboard with folio protector. Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" are iPad Pro keyboard case which fit to iPad Pro device. 
 

 
We successfully crowdfunded our first version of the portable dual function Mokibo keyboard with the integrated trackpad surface in the US, Korea, and Japan and we produced in 2019. Building on the 2019 version, the 2020 Mokibo Folio will feature greatly improved keyboard feel and touch sensitivity.



 

Mokibo 2019 Real Demo for iPadOS
 

Mokibo 2019 Real Demo for Android
 

Mokibo 2019 Real Demo for Windows 10
 

Mokibo 2019 Real Demo for macOS
 

 
Keyboard + Trackpad
 
Mokibo Folio feels like a standard laptop keyboard because that’s what it is. The trackpad is conveniently hidden underneath the right half of the keyboard saving space and minimizing hand movements. Slide your fingers over the keys and see the mouse cursor magically move. The mouse pointer won’t move when you’re typing thanks to the automatic mode recognition algorithm. 

 
 
Scroll
 
You can scroll using two fingers just as you would a standard trackpad. Smoothness is comparable to that of trackpads/mice from leading brands. 
 

Real demo video
 
3-Point Gesture / Tapping
 
You can bring up the dock with a 3-finger tap, and you can to choose the application you want to use.

Real demo video
 
 3-Point Gesture / Swiping up and down 
 
Swipe three fingers up - the iPad shows the applications you have recently used. Swipe three fingers down - the iPad goes to the home screen immediately. 

Real demo video
 
 3-Point Gesture / Swiping left and right 
 
Swipe three fingers left and right - select any application you have recently used.

Real demo video
 
 Tapping for clicking 
 
You can operate left-click, double-click, or triple-click by tapping the keyboard surface with one finger. You can tap the keyboard surface with two fingers for right-click. 
 

Real demo video
 
Multiple gesture actions
 
You can perform various gestures continuously with less arm movement.

Real demo video
 
 Wide Touch Area   
 
The hidden Mokibo Folio trackpad is almost three times larger than some premium trackpads, so you don't have to rub the trackpad multiple times to move the pointer to where you want it. 

 
 
 Pairing with up to 3 devices via Bluetooth 
 
Mokibo can be paired with up to three devices at the same time via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). One Mokibo can be switched from one device to another on your desk with the tap of a key. You can select one of the three devices by pressing the Fn key and one of the F9-F11 keys simultaneously. 

 
 
Support iPad, iPhone, Mac, Android, and Windows
 
Mokibo supports not only iPad OS but also supports iOS, MacOS, Android, and Windows. You can pair with up to three heterogeneous devices. You can switch the OS by pressing the Fn and F12 keys simultaneously. The selected OS is saved and there is no need to select every time unless the device is changed.  

 
 
 Multi-angle Stand 
 
The Mokibo cover allows for a variety of screen angles including the optimum angle for Apple pencil use. Only Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.0" support Multi-angle stand feature.


 
Multimedia keys
 
Mokibo includes a row of multimedia keys placed right above the row of numeric keys. The ESC key and F1-F12 key for Windows OS are available here. The multimedia keys include the virtual keyboard on/off button, media control keys, volume control keys, screen capture key, backlight control key, device selection keys, OS selection key, and battery check key.

 
 Keyboard size 
 
The Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 12.9" has a full sized keyboard with a key pitch of 19mm, and the Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and Mokibo folio Universal have a semi-full sized keyboard with a key pitch of 18mm. 

 *Mokibo folio Universal is not a tablet PC keyboard case. It is just a portable keyboard with folio protector. Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" are iPad Pro keyboard case which fit to iPad Pro device. 
 
Ultra-portable | Thin and Light
 
Mokibo uses a lightweight yet solid material to maximize the portability of your smart device. The side with the keyboard is 6mm, and the opposite cover is only 1.6mm. It weighs only  290grams for Mokibo folio Universal,  440 grams for iPad Pro 11", 545grams for iPad Pro 12.9". 
For Mokibo folio Universal - Mokibo folio Universal is NOT a keyboard case for tablet PC but a portable keyboard with folio cover to protect the keyboard itself. 
 

 
For Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" - Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" are a keyboard case for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" so that it covers iPad Pro 11" and 12.9".
 

 
easy attachment by magnet 
 

 


 *Mokibo folio Universal is not a tablet PC keyboard case. It is just a portable keyboard with folio protector. Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11" and 12.9" are iPad Pro keyboard case which fit to iPad Pro device. 
 

 
Mokibo is the thinnest, lightest, and widest trackpad in its class because the keyboard itself serves as the trackpad. Multi-functional components necessitate less parts and allow for a more competitive price.  
 

 

 

 
 

 
We will conduct a survey before mass production begins to tally up how many of each language we need to produce. To start, we guarantee to support the twelve languages/layouts shown below. If there is any other language/layout requested by more than 300 backers, we will officially support it.
 
1. US        2. Korean     3. UK       4. German     5. French      6. Russian      7. Japanese      
8. Spanish      9. Italian     10. Swiss German     11. Taiwan        12 . Thailand 
* Please request the language you desire during the survey. 
 

We're making an Apple Pencil holder as a separate accessory. The final design has yet to be finalized and two models are currently being tested. When the sample is complete, I will ask you for your opinion and make a decision.
 


 

 

 

 
We are a small but innovative group of professionals with an amazing collection of experience and expertise. We have come a long way since our beginning. With Mokibo Folio, we are taking another leap forward as a team.
 

 

 

 

 
A few weeks before the rewards are shipped, you will receive a post-campaign survey where you will be able to update your shipping address, pick add-ons, and receive the final shipping quote based on the chart below. Please note the listed shipping charges are estimates and may vary slightly as they depend on the currency exchange rates and the total amount of delivery. The more of you back us, the cheaper it will be. ;-) 
 

 

 




 

 



 
 

 
 Mokibo folio - UNIVERSAL 





 
 Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 11"








 

 



 
 
 Mokibo folio for iPad Pro 12.9"
​





 
 


 

 
If you want to partner with us please contact inno@innopresso.com and jenny@innopresso.com. If you are a retailer interested in selling Mokibo products, please contact us as soon as possible. We will advise you when the samples are available. 
If you are a keyboard manufacturer and want to integrate our Mokibo module in your design, please contact inno@innopresso.com and joseph@innopresso.com for licensing.
 
 
 

 
Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.
 
Risks and challenges
Previously, we ran a successful crowdfunding campaign with our first model of Mokibo and delivered to all backers. You can pledge with confidence based on our track record. We will also deliver a product that has been perfected though addressing all the feedbacks we got from the first model we mass produced. And we are now launching a Mokibo Folio for iPad users with upgraded features and quality. However, please note that our product is only at the pilot production stage, so some minor design and functional modifications may be applied. It will work properly with iPadOS 13 or later and most Windows, Android, macOS, and iOS devices. However, some devices that are not an iPad Pro may be unstable with some fuctions or the Bluetooth connectivity. It is important to understand that unexpected things may happen along the way, which are very hard to predict now. For example, delays in shipping can occur due to factors like viruses, travel restrictions, even trade wars, or other manufacturing challenges. Like many, we have been contending with the uncertainties of COVID-19. We’ve decided to manufacture in South Korea where we are based to ensure quality and timely delivery. If any delays were to occur due to any circumstances, we will diligently update all our backers with full transparency. We will do our utmost to eliminate any of doubts you may have along the way. Customer service and communication are of great importance to us and we will make sure to keep you updated throughout the campaign and production.

story:
Reviews from Kickstarter's Backers

 Spaceship Inspired Premium Design

 When it came to designing the new Zeus-X Pro, our team thought it would be only right if the most powerful cable in the world also have the coolest design of all cables. We spent weeks designing and deciding on which direction we would go for and ultimately settled on the idea of modeling it after Sci-Fi spacecrafts.

Ergonomic Slide-able Neck

The neck of the cable which holds the Micro USB and Lightning Adapters is now removable from the base of the USB-C connector. This means if you find yourself in a situation where the adapters are in the way, you could detach the adapter neck and slide it down the cable for more ergonomic use.

Ultra Fast 100W & 10Gbps Data Transfer

Tired of carrying multiple cables for all your devices?

  • Type-C cable for your Macbook or other USB-C laptops
  • Lightning cable for your iPhone, Earpod, iPad
  • Micro-USB cable for your power bank
  • USB 3.1 Gen 2 Type-C cable for your external SSD and portable monitors

With Zeus-X Pro, you will have one cable for everything and anything, from fast data transfer across devices, to streaming 4k 60hz content to an external monitor, to fast charging your phone or laptop. We could use an entire campaign page just discussing ways you, a photographer, traveler, gamer, a tech whiz, student, content creator would use this cable but the only thing you got to know is this does it all.

Compatible with Type-C External Monitors

Now you can connect your laptop/phone directly to your Type-C external monitor and double your screen and efficiency with just 1 cable! Support up to 4k 60hz and touch screen(require compatible external monitor).

20W Apple Fast Charging Technology

Support up to 20W Apple Fast Charge (0-50% in just 30 minutes!)

Tired of your slow charging iPhone cable? With Zeus-X Pro, you can fast charge your iPhone from 0-50% in just 30 minutes! That's more than 6 hours of usage available for just 30 minutes of charging!

For those who are wondering what is the difference between Zeus-X and Zeus-X Pro, here's a comparison chart.

Zeus-X

If you are simply looking for a versatile universal cable to fast-charge all your devices, you can go for our more affordable Zeus-X which can satisfy all your charging needs. As USB-C will slowly become the main stream universal charging port, you can consider to get Zeus-X Pro and future-proof your cable for at least 3 years!  

Zeus-X Pro

If you are an advanced user who needs super powerful 100W power delivery, ultra-fast 10Gbps data transfer speed and 4k video transmission. Zeus-X Pro is the World's First universal cable with such specification, specially designed for professionals who need the best of the best! 

What can your electronic devices or gadgets do when they are out of battery? With Zeus-X cable, you will always have the right cable to charge all your gadgets!

 One Cable To Rule Them All!

 ⚙️6-in-1 Versatility - Fast charge all your USB devices with just 1 cable!

-18W Apple Fast Charge - 0-50% in 30 minutes! 3x faster than standard stock cable!

-60W Power Delivery - Fast charge your Type-C laptops such as Macbook, XPS 13 etc

⚡ Support QC3.0, Samsung Fast Charge and more!

⏩ High Speed Data Transfer

- Strong & Durable Calico Fabric with Anti-Tangle and Anti-Fray Technology

Compatible with most Kickstarter's and Indiegogo's Technology projects!

and much more!

 After the success of our first campaign, we asked ourselves what could we possibly do to make you, our client's life easier. After the amazing input and feedback we have gotten by you guys, Futurizta is finally back with our second-generation Zeus-X Cable with MAJOR spec upgrades along with the features you love the most! 

Introducing the World’s first all in one cable that provides fast charging even for your larger devices such as Macbooks and other USB-C Laptops! The new truly one for all Zeus-X cable supports 18W Apple Fast Charging and 60W Power Delivery for laptops!  If you own more than 2 devices that have different charging interfaces, this is for you!

 

We are bringing back the 6-in-1 features of the cable you love the most and making some tweaks based on user reviews and feedback. As USB-C is making its way to everyone’s lives in the foreseeable future, for the ultimate versatility we introduced USB-C as the main input and output.

Employing the same idea and dream we had in first campaign, the Zeus-X cable retains all the features that made it the leading 6 in 1 cable in the market. This cable is now truly the one and only cable you will ever need on a business trip, a holiday, a photo shoot session or even a date!

 

With the main USB-C output along with Lightning and Micro USB adapters, this cable allows you to charge 99% of USB-devices on the market such as your laptops, smartphones, Nintendo Switch, wireless speakers, Bluetooth headphones, cameras and much more!

 Oh! For maximum versatility, we also incorporated a USB-A adapter on the other end for those of you who want the best of both worlds, the present and the future! 

"Let's go!"

"Heeyy wait, give me 30 minutes I need to charge up my dead phone"

30 minutes later, you have 18% battery and your phone dies within an hour.?

Sounds familiar? We have the perfect solution for you! 

Need extra juice in a short time? With 18W Apple Fast Charge, you will be fully charged in no time! 

 With Zeus-X , you can fast charge from 0-50% in just 30 minutes! That's more than 6 hours of usage available for just 30 minutes of charging!


 

 Zeus-X can fast charge your iPhone almost 3X faster than your conventional cable! Say goodbye to your old, slow and fragile charging cable! 

Note: A PD-Compatible Charger is required to activate Fast Charging(Minimum 18W). Only iPhone 8 and above support this feature. Refer to Apple's official website for supported devices.

 

 

Imagine this, you are laying comfortably on your couch and your laptop runs out of battery……instead of using the cable that is charging your phone, you now have to drag yourself up, find the laptop charger, sit down and plug it in…..Waste of my time if you ask me…..

or

You can use Zeus-X with your laptop charger and fast charge your phone and laptop seamlessly! Isn't that convenient?

With 60W Power Delivery, you can fully charge your Macbook Pro 13" in just 1.5 hours!

 With Power Delivery technology, you can also fast charge most of your PD-compatible devices such as iPad Pro, Nintendo Switch, powerbanks and much more! 

 Introducing the Calico Fabric braided cable which after thousands of stress tests shows unparalleled strength and durability. This innovation allows the cable to withstand the toughest use under any situation and environment. The woven exterior of the cable not only provides crucial structural integrity that could prevent tearing and fraying from everyday use, it also helps it withstand extreme forms of punishment. Doesn’t matter if you are skiing in the alps, riding through the Sahara desert or on the ocean facing rough winds, Zeus-X will be ready and operational to help you keep your devices charged and data transferred.

Super strong and durable with up to 15,000 bending lifespan

Before realizing our dream of building the perfect cable, me and my team had multiple cables which works great but would get worn down so quick after multiple uses that we would have to buy new ones every year. When we started this project, we took it personal to see that the cable that we made would be made of the best quality components and fabric that would be able to withstand heavy uses under all situations for a long period of time. After testing more than 20 types of fabric, materials and weave patterns, we found the perfect combination which incorporates quality, flexibility, durability and strength. This material provide our cable with over 15,000+ of bending lifespan and still works like a charm!

We have utilized our experience and expertise to make our cable

Powerful - Zeus-X uses 20 AWG copper wires - A much thicker and more powerful copper wire, allowing it to carry more current across the cable and thus charge 3x faster than conventional 1A/ 28AWG cable! 

Longer Lasting - The tinned copper core provides anti-corrosion properties which make the cable last much longer even in environments with high moisture and humidity. This is commonly used in marine appliances and cables to extend their lifespan. 

Stable - The internal of the cable is coated with an aluminium foil to minimize external interference, ensuring a smooth and stable charging and data transfer.

Safe - Thanks to its 20AWG copper core, Zeus-X has a very small electrical resistance across the cable ; thus minimizing heat lost and prevent overheating. The external TPE fire retardant plastic will ensure the cable never catch on fire.

Note: AWG stands for American Wire Gauge - It is a U.S. standard set of non-ferrous wire conductor sizes. In summary, it is a measurement of the diameter of the copper wire in a cable. Lower AWG represent thicker and bigger wire diameter(Better, just like Zeus-X's 20AWG). 

Need a quick data transfer on the go? Zeus-X got you covered!

Unlike multi cables currently on the market that only focuses on charging, we at Futurizta Tech have made so that Zeus-X supports stable and secure high speed data transfer across different devices including Android Smartphone, IOS devices, GoPro, Camera and much more!

* Support Android Auto and Apple Carplay. 

Based on numerous tests and trial runs, we have made an improved smart chip which further protects and supports fast data transfer. The new smart chip runs on an adaptive algorithm that regulates the amount of power that runs through the cable to ensure that you would have the fastest data and power transfer speed available without compromising your safety and security. This smart chip allow Zeus-X to charge various gadgets ranging from small appliances such a smartwatch to power-hungry laptops with the appropriate power to ensure fast and secure charging! 

Big companies tries to sell you 6 cables separately to maximize their profit whereas we just want to make your life easier. Why buy 6 cables and clutter up your bag and workspace when you can get one cable to do everything for all at such an affordable price!

Goodbye Messy Cable! Zeus-X is here to change the game!

 

 Zeus-X is just like a Swiss Army Knife - Multifunctional , Always Ready, and Convenient!

Forget about powerbank, now you can charge your phone with your buddy's phone!

Watch drone footage directly on your phone!

Charge your Earpod with an iPad Pro!

 

Zeus-X - The ultimate cable to make your life easier!

 

 

$50,000 Stretch goal Unlocked! Zeus-X will now come with an LED indicator. 

$75,000 Stretch Goal Unlocked!:Zeus-X Pro - The World's Most Powerful Universal Cable

Introducing the World's Most Powerful Universal Cable - Zeus-X Pro

  • All the features from Zeus-X
  • Support 100W Power Delivery, QC 4.0 , Huawei Supercharge
  • E-Mark Chip
  • Ultra Fast 10Gbps Data Transfer ( More than 20x Faster than USB 2.0)
  • 4k 60Hz Video Transmit for external monitor
  • 1.5m/5ft Length (Not too short, Not too long)
  • Futuristic design with Premium material - Inspired by Sci-Fi Spacecraft
  • Futuristic Design inspired by Sci-Fi Spacecraft

This ultimate all-in-one cable is designed to handle even the most demanding task! Now you can connect your laptop/phone directly to your external monitor and double your screen and efficiency with just 1 cable! Zeus-X Pro's ultra-fast 5Gbps data transfer will allow you to transfer big files in a flash! With its futuristic and luxurious design, this will be the most powerful and futuristic looking cable you can own!

 The Flexiclip's outer surface is made with high quality silicone to provide a rubbery surface to increase friction; This allows it to  have enough friction to hold a phone steadily when used in phone stand mode.

 The internal of Flexiclip is made of a flexible metal sheet with 2 magnets on each side, allowing the Flexiclip to stick together or "clip" the cable. Thanks to its flexible bendable metal sheet, you can bend it to any shape you like to do a lot more! For example, money clip, bookmark, magnet fidget toy and more! 

Organize your cable easily with FlexiClip!

Transform easily into a Phone Stand!​

Double the Screen, Double the Productivity and Efficiency!​

Flexiclip can also hold your cable in place to keep your workspace tidy and organized!

Tired of cable slipping away and you have to pick it up every time?

Get Flexiclip now to make your life easier!​

Make your life easier with this super convenient cable organizer and a handy phone stand whenever you need! 

Zeus-X + Flexiclip = Life made easier!

Available in Black and White! 

 

Prototypes and Samples

After months of testing and quality control tests, we've chosen a new manufacturer that produces the best cable quality that meets all our requirements and standards.

When our fundraising goal is met, we will immediately begin mass production so you will be able to get our Futurizta Cable as soon as possible. The fund raised will go towards mold creation, materials, production, packaging and shipping.

With the experienced gained from our first campaign along with years of E-Commerce experience, we are confident to deliver the product on time with the help of top-tier fulfillment company. As for our track record, we've delivered and fulfilled all our first campaign's rewards on time! 

We would love for you to be a part of this campaign and family. What we need now is your support to kick start this project. With your help, we will be able to introduce this ultimate all-in-one cable to the world and pursue our dream of making your life easier!

 

 

Design Choices & Ideas

Why not 100W Power Delivery? 

Of course, we would love to develop the ultimate universal cable with 100W Power Delivery! However due to the compatibility issue between E-Mark chip(Required for all 100W Charging Cable) and  18W Apple fast charge chipset, we are unable to make this happen at the moment. Based on our survey, most people prefer to have a faster-charging speed for their smartphone as this is the devices they use from day to night. Moreover, 60W is sufficient for most laptops for light to medium work and it can still charge decently fast for bigger laptop like Macbook Pro 16" or XPS 17".  Thus we've decided to opt for the 60W + 18W Apple Fast Charge configuration. Do not worry, we will continue to work on this and try to find a workaround to solve this issue!  

NOTE: This issue has been solved and thus we have released Zeus-X Pro, the ultimate universal cable with the most powerful specification to date! 

 

Why not magnetic?

 We love the idea of magnetic cable and we even sell our own magnetic adapter! However magnetic cable falls short on certain circumstances.

Connect your phone to your magnetic charging cable and put in your pocket or bag; When you take it out, you will realize that they are disconnected and your phone is now out of battery :(

Planning to game or watch movies in horizontal mode? You will have hard time trying to keep the magnetic cable in place - They snap off too easily! 

Thus, We've decided to move on with the adapter design as it provides better stability and usability. 

We are proud to announce that our Futurizta Cable V1 is awarded with the "Amazon Choice" badge, a badge for highly rated and quality product.

5 stars review from our lovely customers!

As seen on UrAvgConsumer Youtube  Tech channel with 2.9 million subscriber! 

"This thing pretty much covers everything"

"A nice braided cable"

"Support Fast Charging, very good very good!"

Check out full video here!

Reviews from our Official Store

 

 

Thanks to the support from our backers, we have now expanded our business to US and Australia. We have partnered up with Amazon as our logistic partner in these countries. Once our production is completed, we will send a portion of the stocks to our Amazon warehouse in Australia and United States so we can utilize their fast express shipping to deliver the rewards to backers as soon as possible! 

For backers outside Australia and United State, we will use international shipping which usually takes 10-15 business days. 

 Mass production should be completed on November and we can start shipping if everything goes smoothly. However we have added an extra month as buffer to ensure we have time for any unexpected hiccups or obstacles.  

 Due to COVID-19 Pandemic, we are unable to provide an accurate shipping quote right now as the price fluctuate everyday. However as our cable is small and light, we are confident that we can keep the shipping fee under $10. The actual shipping fee will be provided after the campaign ended. We will also provide express shipping(DHL or Fedex) for backers who want to get the product as soon as possible. 

Note: Family Pack and Office Pack's shipping fee may be slightly expensive as it contain more units and thus it is heavier.

story:
ECLLPSE is a revolutionary portable storage drive designed for cross-device users that enables quick and hassle-free data transfer and data backup on the go.


With up to 2TB of storage, ECLLPSE is the world’s first and only portable SSD with OTG File Manager support capabilities for seamless data backup and storage for iPhone, iPad, and other iOS devices(iOS 13 or later) using a lightning connector. ECLLPSE’s USB-C supports high-speed data transfer at up to 550MB/s and is compatible with Macs, PCs, Android devices, and digital cameras. With this small, lightweight, shockproof, and waterproof drive, you can now backup your devices anytime, anywhere.

 

 

 

  • High performance: ECLLPSE's built-in USB 3.1 Gen 2 interface provides read and write speeds of up to 550MB/s, conveniently backing up a large number of multimedia files.
  • Small and Lightweight: Only 19g and its super tiny dimensions of 3.3'" x 0.8" x0.5", ECLLPSE defies conventional dimensions of SSDs. Its portable size allows you  to bring it anywhere and everywhere.
  • No Cable Require: Included adapters means there's one less thing to carry around.
  • Durable Design: Protected from dust and capable of withstanding water immersion between 15 cm and 1 meter for 30 minutes.
  • Multi-device Compatibility: ECLLPSE comes with multiple adapters for every device imaginable, including smartphones, tablet, PC, PS4, Mac, and camera.

 

 

 

From travellers and gamers to businessmen to photographers and designers. ECLLPSE is for everyone. What’s important is that your ECLLPSE meets your storage needs.

 

 

 

Comparable to the size of a USB thumb drive, ECLLPSE is a solid-state hard drive with up to 550 MB/s transfer speed, that's 4x faster than your typical external hard disk. 

 

 

It takes only 39 seconds to transfer a 20GB video to your ECLLPSE, which is 20x faster than your typical SD card.

 

ECLLPSE takes about 20 seconds to transfer 11GB video 

 

Due to its high read and write speeds, you can edit all your creative files, play games and watch 4K movies directly from ECLLPSE!

 

 

 

Durability is key when it comes to a portable hard drive you can take everywhere with you. With a rating of IP67, it is 100% protected against solid objects such as dust and sand; it's also been tested to work for at least 30 minutes under up to 1m of water.

 

 

Its durable design and high impact plastic exterior makes ECLLPSE virtually indestructible.

 

 

ECLLPSE comes with multiple adapters for every device imaginable. With its lightning adapter, you can connect, backup and transfer data from any iPhone or iPad. The USB-C adapter connects to any PC, Android and digital camera as external storage, macOS Time Machine or Windows To Go.

 

 

 

 

 

ECLLPSE is a compact, portable, lightweight, and blazing fast external SSD that is designed to work with your Mac and other devices. It arrives in a convenient stick structure that is anything but difficult to haul around. Weighing 19g/0.67oz, it’s ideal as portable, everyday item.

 

 

iOS 13 allows iPhones and iPads to connect to external hard drives and flash drives like never before. With a drive attached, you'll be able to move files around freely between the drive and your iPhone or iPad.

 

 

The reality is, backing up your smartphone or iPad to a hard drive or an SSD is a troublesome task; you’ll need an adapter, an additional power source and a laptop.

 

 

With ECLLPSE, it’s simply a matter of plugging it to your smartphone. You can easily backup and transfer files anywhere and anytime.

 

 

Tiny and lightweight, you can keep your photos, videos and any other files securely handy.

 

 

As a bootable drive, you can install Windows on ECLLPSE and take it anywhere you go! It also saves installation space on your laptop, making it extremely flexible.

 

 
Black Magic speed test
 
 
10GB file transfer test
 

 

Android phone demo

 

 

iPad Pro demo

 

With up to 2TB high efficiency storage, you will have all the space you need for your media, gaming, data and program files, ECLLPSE will effectively and efficiently boost your computing experience.

 

 

(Windows License Not Included)

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A bunch of nerds tired of waiting for their smartphones, cameras and laptops to backup when they’re shooting and working on the go, Team ECLLPSE found more problems than solutions when looking for SSDs that suited their needs.

 

Tired of waiting for the next best SSD drive to be invented, Team ECLLPSE decided to answer their own cry for help and created a quick, no-fuss storage solution. The result is an SSD drive that has everything a nerd-on-the-go would need minus all the useless features.

From travellers and gamers to businessmen to photographers and designers. ECLLPSE is for everyone. What’s important is that your ECLLPSE meets your storage needs.
 
 


 
Comparable to the size of a USB thumb drive, ECLLPSE is a solid-state hard drive with up to 550 MB/s transfer speed, that's 4x faster than your typical external hard disk. 
 

 
It takes only 39 seconds to transfer a 20GB video to your ECLLPSE, which is 20x faster than your typical SD card.

 
ECLLPSE takes about 20 seconds to transfer 11GB video 
 

Due to its high read and write speeds, you can edit all your creative files, play games and watch 4K movies directly from ECLLPSE!
 
 


 
Durability is key when it comes to a portable hard drive you can take everywhere with you. With a rating of IP67, it is 100% protected against solid objects such as dust and sand; it's also been tested to work for at least 30 minutes under up to 1m of water.
 

 
Its durable design and high impact plastic exterior makes ECLLPSE virtually indestructible.
 


 
ECLLPSE comes with multiple adapters for every device imaginable. With its lightning adapter, you can connect, backup and transfer data from any iPhone or iPad. The USB-C adapter connects to any PC, Android and digital camera as external storage, macOS Time Machine or Windows To Go.
 

 
 


 


 
ECLLPSE is a compact, portable, lightweight, and blazing fast external SSD that is designed to work with your Mac and other devices. It arrives in a convenient stick structure that is anything but difficult to haul around. Weighing 19g/0.67oz, it’s ideal as portable, everyday item.
 
 

iOS 13 allows iPhones and iPads to connect to external hard drives and flash drives like never before. With a drive attached, you'll be able to move files around freely between the drive and your iPhone or iPad.
 

 
The reality is, backing up your smartphone or iPad to a hard drive or an SSD is a troublesome task; you’ll need an adapter, an additional power source and a laptop.
 

 
With ECLLPSE, it’s simply a matter of plugging it to your smartphone. You can easily backup and transfer files anywhere and anytime.
 

 
Tiny and lightweight, you can keep your photos, videos and any other files securely handy.

 

 
As a bootable drive, you can install Windows on ECLLPSE and take it anywhere you go! It also saves installation space on your laptop, making it extremely flexible.
 



 
Black Magic speed test
 

 
10GB file transfer test
 


 
Android phone demo
 

 
iPad Pro demo




 
With up to 2TB high efficiency storage, you will have all the space you need for your media, gaming, data and program files, ECLLPSE will effectively and efficiently boost your computing experience.
 
 


(Windows License Not Included)
 
 
 


 


 
 

 

 


 

A bunch of nerds tired of waiting for their smartphones, cameras and laptops to backup when they’re shooting and working on the go, Team ECLLPSE found more problems than solutions when looking for SSDs that suited their needs.

 
Tired of waiting for the next best SSD drive to be invented, Team ECLLPSE decided to answer their own cry for help and created a quick, no-fuss storage solution. The result is an SSD drive that has everything a nerd-on-the-go would need minus all the useless features. 
 
 




 
 

 
 



Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
We are setting up fulfilment centres in Australia, US, UK (Guaranteed), EU & India (Processing). This is to enable faster delivery and to help you avoid Customs charges.
 


Anchor is compatible with all Android Qi wireless enabled Smartphones (such as - Samsung, Huawei, Pixel, Motorola, Oppo, Xiaomi, LG and more). 

Scroll to the bottom to learn more about the VOLTA ANCHOR... 

Fed up with hoarding multiple slow charging blocks?

We were too so we did something about it!!!

That's why we created the world's fastest and most powerful singular GaN charger!
Imagine being able to charge all of your daily devices up to 4x faster with just a single block?

The GIGA allows you to declutter your workspace. Keep it simple and get VOLTA GIGA.
 


Introducing the Must Have VOLTA GIGA - GaN charger. The Most Powerful Fast Charging GaN Power Pack is Here!  This sleek compact GaN charger comes in 130W and 200W sizes.


GIGA comes with the most advanced IC and PCBA. This means all GIGA chargers are compatible with iPhone 12 series 20W fast charging. GIGA also supports the Samsung 25W Super Fast Charging (PPS) protocol. 

 



Clean up your desk and declutter your workspace by getting rid of your old slow chargers. Charge FASTER with the GIGA instead.
Comfortably replace four other chargers with one Giga GaN charger and enjoy the hitch-free fast charging. 



We are certain, you will be as excited as us when you lay your hands on the GIGA in November 2021. 


 


 

1 GaN Charger for ALL Your Powerful Devices | Super Fast Charge 4 Devices Simultaneously

Charge faster, effortlessly with the most advanced charging technology.
GIGA provides you with 4 charging ports that are compatible with all the latest Quick and fast charging protocols. 3 x USB-C Power Delivery 3.0 plus 1 x USB-A (supporting QC3.0, AFC, VOOC, SCP & FCP).

With GIGA, experience optimum power flowing independently through each of its x3 USB-C and x1 USB-A outlets to fast charge four devices, including two Laptops, at the same time.

 

 

 

     


The GaN Charger detects and prevents high temperature, over-voltage, short circuits, and more with built-in protection.

 


With GaN technology we were able to put more power into a pocket sized GIGA to power 4 devices simultaneously.

Sometimes, great things come in small sizes and at 78mm in length, it is the world's smallest 130W charger, or you can almost double the power with the 200W charger that measures only 84mm in length.

 

 



GIGA GaN Charger is made to go everywhere you go With both fitting easily into your pocket as reliable companions for fast charging all USB and USB-C PD devices that includes your laptops, smartphones, game consoles, iPads, and much more, all with a charger that is smaller than your credit card.

 

For your convenience and seamless use of GIGA worldwide.

GIGA comes with interchangeable plug converters that offer worldwide compatibility.
Making GIGA your perfect travel companion! Seamlessly connect with GIGA and go.

 

 

Gone are the days of hoarding multiple chargers. With x3 USB-C & x1 USB-A outputs you can easily (Super) Fast Charge x2 MacBook Pro and More devices Simultaneously.

 


Featuring a sleek compact design, these 130W and 200W chargers put more power in your hand while delivering extra value for money. 

 

 



The design direction is focused on having more strong materials, colours and finishings.
The details are precisely cutout, with a strong accent on the light reflection that were derive from those elaborations. 

 


33W GaN Fast Charger"

Input：100-240V~50/60Hz 0.8A
Output：USB:5V 4.5A/5V 3A/9V 3A/ 12V 2.5A /15V 2A/ 20V 1.5A
              Type-C:5V 3A/ 9V 3A/ 10V 2.25A/ 12V 2.5A/ 15V 2A/ 20V 1.5A
              Type-C+USB:5V 4.5A

PPS：3.3V-11V=3A（Max：33W）

Distribution: 21W (USB-C) + 12W (USB A)

Dimension: 33.5*33.5*38mm
Weight: 52g

 


Input:
100V - 240V ~ 50-/60hz 1.8A

OUTPUT: 
USB-C 1 (100W): 
PD3.0: 3.3 21V/5A; 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/5A

USB-C 2 (100W): 
PD3.0: 3.3V-21V/5A; 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/5A

USB-C 3 (30W):  PD3.0, 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/2A

USB-A (30W) SCP & QC 3.0: 4.5V/5A, 5V/4.5A, 9V/3A, 12V/2.5A, 20V/1.5A, 11V/3A

PLUG: US/EU/UK/AU Plugs

Certifications:
ETL, FCC, CB, PSE
PPS/PD3.0/PD2.0, QC4+/QC4.0/QC3.0/QC2.0, PE2.0, PE1.0, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP.
Efficient synchronous rectification scheme, up to 90% of the conversion. 
 

200W - COMBINATION LOAD/OUTPUT:
USB-C1 + USB-C2: 100W + 100W (200W MAX)
USB-C1 + USB-C3: 100W + 65W (165W MAX)
USB-C2 + USB-C3: 100W + 65W (165W MAX)

USB-C1 + USB-A: 100W + 65W (165W MAX)
USB-C2 + USB-A: 100W + 65W (165W MAX)
USB-C3 + USB-A: 25W (share) (5V/3A+2A (25W MAX)) 
USB-C1+ USB-C2 + USB-C3: 100W + 65W + 30W 

USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-A: 100W + 65W + 30W
USB-C1 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 100W + 15W(5V/3A)  
USB-C2 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 100W + 25W (share) (5V/3A+2A (25W MAX))   

USB-C1+ USB-C2 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 100W + 65W + 25W (share) (5V/3A+2A (25W MAX))

PLUG:
US - with EU/UK/AU Adapter.

Certification:
ETL, FCC, CB, PSE
PPS/PD3.0/PD2.0, QC4+/QC4.0/QC3.0/QC2.0, PE2.0, PE1.0, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP.
Efficient synchronous rectification scheme, up to 90% of the conversion. 

Input: 100V - 240V ~ 5-/60hz 1.8A 

OUTPUT: 
USB-C 1 (100W):
PD3.0: 3.3 21V/5A; 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 15V/3A,12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/5A

USB-C 2 (100W): 
PD3.0: 3.3-21V/5A; 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 15V/3A, 12V/3A, 15V/3A, 20V/5A

USB-C 3 (30W) :
PD3.0, 3.3-11V4A; 5V/3A, 9V/3A, 15V/3A, 12V/2.5A, 15V/2A, 20V/1.5A

 

130W COMBINATION LOAD/OUTPUT:

USB-C1 + USB-C2: 65W + 65W (130W MAX)
USB-C1 + USB-C3: 100W + 30W (130W MAX)
USB-C2 + USB-C3: 90W + 30W (130W MAX)

USB-C1 + USB-A: 65W + 30W (95W MAX)
USB-C2 + USB-A: 100W + 30W (130W MAX)
USB-C3 + USB-A: 5V/3A (15W MAX) 
USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-C3: 65W + 30W + 30W 

USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-A: 65W + 30W + 30W
USB-C1 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 100W + 15W(5V/3A)  
USB-C2 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 100W + 15W(5V/3A) 

USB-C1 + USB-C2 + USB-C3 + USB-A: 65W + 30W + 15W(5V/3A) 

PLUG: US - with EU/UK/AU Adapter.

Certifications:
ETL, FCC, CB, PSE
PPS/PD3.0/PD2.0, QC4+/QC4.0/QC3.0/QC2.0, PE2.0, PE1.0, AFC, FCP, SCP, SFCP.
Efficient synchronous rectification scheme, up to 90% of the conversion. 

 

       

Simply put, it is an abbreviation for the chemical compound Gallium Nitride. It possesses some unique properties that make it an excellent semiconductor, touted as the most suitable replacement for silicon. With wide-ranging applications in consumer electronics; from microwave ovens, blu-ray discs to chargers, chances are that your next piece of electronics could be powered by GaN.

Gallium Nitride is a wide band gap semiconductor, meaning it can operate at higher voltage and temperature ranges than conventional semiconductors like silicon. The GaN crystalline structure is also low-resistance allowing for very high electron mobility, and this is why it is now being widely adopted in chargers as a very small fraction of conducted electricity is lost to heat, giving more energy to power your devices.

GaN now makes it possible for high-voltage electrical components to be packed closely together without overheating. In essence, you can get a pocket-sized 200W charger with multi-outlets capable of providing a full charge for your MacBook Pro 16" (96W), iPhones, iPads and Android devices (65W). Unlike older silicon models, GaN chargers are now equipped with smart chips and Power Delivery technology that ensures your device is only getting the right amount of power it needs for an optimum charge.In a modern, fast-paced world where most things are done on the go, size matters. So you don't need to pack multiple bulky chargers for laptops, phones and cameras. The VOLTA GIGA GaN charger offers you that portability without compromising on power.


VOLTA Anchor 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charger Stand

Simultaneously Charge 3 devices: iPhones (8/X/11/12/13), AirPods/Apple Watch & ALL Qi wireless Smartphones (Androids). Magnetic mount that works for older iPhones and Androids.

Anchor is compatible with all Android Qi wireless enabled Smartphones (such as - Samsung, Huawei, Pixel, Motorola, Oppo, Xiaomi, LG and more). 

PROPERTIES 

Material: Steel + Aluminium + Silica Gel 

Colour: Silver/Space Grey

Power Interface: USB-C Input

Input: DC 5V = 2A, 9V ~ 2A, 12V ~ 1.5A Max (It is recommended to use a QC/PD Adapter with the power of 18W or above)

Output: 18W Max

Compatibility: The Magnetic Wireless charger maintains compatibility with Qi charging, it supports iPhone with MagSafe function (best). It also can be used to wirelessly charge other devices with Qi-certified and Apple Watch.  

- Now you have a Question, right?
Which Phones are compatible with Anchor Wireless Stand? ALL ANDROID AND iPHONES WITH WIRELESS CHARGING CAPABILITY. Yes, you read that right. This is made possible with the VOLTA Magnetic Ring. 


We've made a Magnetic Ring which you can easily stick (like a pop socket) to back of ANY PHONE (Androids and older iPhones alike) to give your phone the MagSafe capability (just like the iPhone 12/13 series). The Magnetic Ring will work for all phones that has Wireless Charging capability. It can also be used as a Mag Stand accessory for your phone. 

The Mag Ring is available as Add-on at the checkout for just $5. 
 


 

 

  

How is VOLTA Anchor different from the competition?
Well that's pretty easy. Theirs doesn't work with older iPhones and Android Phones (MagSafe like effect).

Most importantly, VOLTA Anchor is just $55 and theirs is $150. 
For a limited time ONLY. The prices are going up in the next 12 hours. 
 

 


 



 

VOLTA SPARK 60W vs 100W
COMPARISON CHART



Stop wasting your money on weak, gimmicky slow charging cables that don’t last.
The revolutionary universal charging cable the world has been waiting for is here.
VOLTA Spark changes the game forever with:

 
 



You will be able to add any of these Add-ons at the checkout.

First select the perk of your choice from the right hand side of the campaign page. Then you will see the add-ons at check out. 



Should in case you want multiple add-ons. Scroll back to the top and select the Access To Add-ons perk at the right hand side of the campaign. This perk is $1 as we cannot put a value of $0. 
You have nothing to worry about, the $1 will be credited back to you Backerkit account at the end of the campaign. You can then use the extra $ you have put towards the campaign to get other items. 

 


 

 



Be sure to follow us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things VOLTA and take part in our various competitions and constantly thriving community (click to connect)!

story:
LAMBOGO is a compact SSD with up to 8TB of storage having built-in WIFI that supports most of your devices. It allows you to transfer your data, stream your video, music, drone footage, and many more anytime anywhere. This is perfect for those who are always on the go and want something portable and durable. 

 

 

 

Thank you to all backers supporting LAMBOCHARGE. Our first campaign has completed and orders have shipped successfully. We are so excited to launch our next product, LAMBOGO.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ONE-TOUCH COPY

LAMBOGO doesn’t require any cable or computer. As long as you have an external SD card/USB Flash Drive, you can begin to transfer and backup your data. This is especially convenient for those who always have to work on the field.  Not to mention, you can preview your photos and stream 4K videos directly from LAMBOGO to any device!

 

 

Just Plug in and Press the button. Your files will be backed up within minutes. With 320MB/s transfer speed, it only takes 7 minutes to back up a 128 GB SD Card.

 

 

 

 

LAMBOGO is a solid-state hard drive with up to 2400 MB/s transfer speed, that's 17X faster than your typical external hard disk. It takes only 20 seconds to transfer a 48GB video to your LAMBOGO.

 

 

Tested using Blackmagic Disk Speed Test, LAMBOGO can hit stable read and write speeds of up to 2400 MB/s.

 

 

You can also connect LAMBOGO with Wi-Fi. You can access and transfer your files wirelessly with speeds of up to 900 MB/s.

 

 

 

BUILT-IN FAN DESIGN

LAMBOGO includes an Anti-overheat Protection Design.  When transferring a large amount of data, heat will easily build up in the device and may cause damage. LAMBOGO comes in with a Built-in Fan to ensure steady heat dissipation. This helps maintaining a high performance stably and improves its longevity.

 

 

Overheating is a common issue when a large amounts of data is being transferred. It will result in a slower transfer speed and affect the overall performance. LAMBOGO's internal cooling system helps to release heat and maintain suitable temperature for optimal performance. 

 

 

 

 

LAMBOGO can store up to 8TB of data, allowing you to have plenty of room and versatility for creating content and backing up work files.  Do not let your creativity get limited by the lack of storage!

 

 

With up to 8TB storage, you will get the space needed to save all of your media, data, game and program files. The extra available storage will enhance your computing experience.

 

 

 

You can wirelessly connect your LAMBOGO to access and edit saved photos or smoothly stream 4K videos directly to your phone or tablet using the LAMBOGO app.

 

 

RAW IMAGE SUPPORT

With LAMBOGO's custom application, you can preview your media and manage your files — all through your Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac OS Device. You can even preview and export RAW images, to edit them with third-party apps.

 

 

You can preview images on the go easily. Start your work and edit even you are not at your workplace.

 

 

4K STREAMING

No Download Time or Memory Space needed. With LAMBOGO App, you can immediately access and stream 4K videos directly to your phone or tablet.

 

 

You can stream multiple videos to multiple devices. Sharing your library with your family and friends.

 

 

CONNECT MULTIPLE DEVICES

LAMBOGO can connect to multiple devices at the same time inside the same WIFI spectrum. You can then share your media library to anyone, making it much easier to download and share your files.

 

 

 

 

WATER RESISTANCE

Rain or Shine, shoot and store in any environment. LAMBOGO is ready for your next outdoor shooting section. The Water-resistant case protects against drops and rain, and the Splash-proof seal repels water and dust.

 

LAMBOGO is designed to repel splashes of light water on the device. This is great if you plan to travel with it when it is raining . Hardware is protected from dust and capable of withstanding light water immersion.

 

 

SHOCK RESISTANCE

Rugged and sturdy, capable to withstand any environment. Durability is very crucial when it comes to a portable storage. The case is designed to protect LAMBOGO from dust, sand, and to be resistant and protect against shock, so you can bring it everywhere without worries.

 

 

 

 

ONE DEVICE FOR ALL GADGETS

No matter you use Mac or Windows, iOS or Android, you are a photographer or a game-lover, LAMBOGO can back you up. Back up your files and games, LAMBOGO brings you more safety and security.

 

 

ALL-DAY BATTERY LIFE

LAMBOGO has up to 8 hours continuous use. Bring it on an all-day shoot, stay out in the field longer. Take it on a long trip, continuously streaming videos on the road or in flight. The integrated 5000 mAh power bank can even charge your mobiles, cameras and other devices on the go too.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Color

 

 

Storage Capacity

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Add-On

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Hi! We are the LAMBOTECH team, and we are happy to launch our 2nd campaign. Our first campaign, LAMBOCHARGE, was ended successfully and has shipped out all the orders.

 

We are a team of professionals with diverse backgrounds in engineering, software development, digital marketing, personal relations, product development, logistics, and many more to maintain the standard and execution.

 

Elijah and Noah, the two top-notch engineering experts who have been in the industry for years are now seeking this opportunity to create new gadgets that will outperform the industry.

story:
Made for MagSafe

Leveraging the new MagSafe technology for iPhone 12, you get seamless alignment and fast wireless charging every time for the easiest way to charge yet. The secure connection keeps your iPhone safely in place, even when your group text has it buzzing nonstop.

 

Charge All Your Apple Devices, All at Once

Charge your iPhone 12, Apple Watch, AirPods and Charges iPad or third device via USB-C port all at the same time with the 6-in-1 Wireless Charger. There’s the MagSafe wireless stand which charges up to 15W for iPhone 12, the magnetic charging module for Apple Watch and a Qi pad to wirelessly charge your AirPods.

 

Architecturally Gravity Design 

Premium finishes like stainless steel complement your new iPhone 12 and other Apple devices. The bold, modern design fits perfectly in any space, from office to living room.

 

we welcome the new member Mr. Black available now!

 

Compatibility

New MagSafe iPhone 12

iPhone 12 Pro Max

iPhone 12 Pro

iPhone 12

iPhone 12 mini

MagSafe Apple Watch

Apple Watch SE

Apple Watch Series 6

Apple Watch Series 5

Apple Watch Series 4

Apple Watch Series 3

Apple Watch Series 2

Apple Watch Series 1

2X Qi Universal (Base)

AirPods Pro

Apple AirPods 2nd Gen

Fast Wireless Charging - Qi Universal for iPhone 8 ~12, Samsung, Android Phone...

Rear USB-C port connectors

USB-C Cable connectors USB-C to - iPad, Tablet, Samsung, Android Phone...

Rear 3.5mm headphone jack (Hi-Fi & ProMax BT 5.2 aptX-HD Hi-RES audio version)

Hi-Fi or aptX-HD Hi-RES audio out for headphones or Speakers

LED Light

Desktop LED light function, Touch switch to turn LED light ON / OFF, The natural and comfortable dimming light is great for relaxing at home and sleep-friendly. Just press the touch panel to turn on the LED light.

Qi Universal

Qi charging for all iPhone 8~12, AirPods, Samsung and Android Phone...

Colors

Black or White color (choose on the survey option)

 

Power distribution

Diesel3 Lite supports full load power up to 38W max.

Diesel3 ProMax supports full load power up to 45W max.

The Power distribution is as follows:

Power profile: Qi-certified with EPP

Charging stand new MagSafe for iPhone12 power: 15 watts

Charging pad dual Qi power: 10~15 watts

Apple Watch power: 3~5 watts

USB-C Wire charging: 10~20 watts

Concurrent power: All five charging pads may be used concurrently at their maximum wattage

 

Add-on Turbo-CHARGE PD GaN Wall Charger

Turbo-CHARGE PD GaN Wall Charger USB-C Power Delivery Next-gen Gallium Nitride (GaN) technology provides high-performance charging in a lightweight, compact design Intelligent power direct the most efficient charge to each connected device Gallium nitride (GaN) transistors offer high performance in a compact design

 

Add-on Universal MagSafe Pad

Universal MagSafe Pad : iPhone & Android MagSafe features chargers and accessories that magnetically snap on and seamlessly become parts of the phones. MagSafe magnetic wireless charging & phone pad for all iPhones & Androids — boost work & leisure at home.

story:
The SMARTCOBY Pro 30W is equipped with battery cells that are also used in Tesla vehicles.

 It is the next-generation power bank that combines compactness with high output while also ensuring safety.

 

Product Review

 

*This video has subtitles. You can choose the language in the subtitle settings.

 

As technology continues to make devices smaller and lighter, chargers and batteries are naturally required to be smaller as well.

 

Nowadays, various devices such as the iPhone 12 are compatible with 20W chargers, and the MI MacBooks are also becoming more compact while requiring higher output, meanings chargers and mobile batteries also need to have more capacity than before.

 

 

However, achieving high power in chargers and mobile batteries requires a lot of electrical energy.

In the case of mobile batteries, it depends on the capacity of the battery cell (battery) that supplies the power and the technology used to manufacture the battery. As a result, in most cases, high-power batteries remain large, heavy, and difficult to carry around.

The SMARTCOBY Pro 30W makes use of the same high power density battery cells used in Tesla cars, compressing energy to the limit to produce a compact, high-power battery.

 

 

SMARTCOBY Pro is by far the most compact and portable battery, especially compared to conventional batteries that support more than 30W.


 

 

You can charge your smartphone, tablet devices, and even your laptop. It supports PD30W charging, so M1 MacBooks can be charged too.

 

It can also be used as a power source when working in cafes, when working from home, or when working remotely.

 

 

Its compact size and high power output makes it easy to carry around, and it will not disturb you if you use it for game consoles or other devices.

 

 

It has both 30W output and low current mode, so you can use it for many devices.

 

 

 

What do you think the most important quality for a portable power bank is? We believe the answer is compactness, as if a power bank is too bulky, you won’t want to carry it around with you, and you will end up leaving it at home.

SMARTCOBY Pro 30W fits in your palm, but it is also powerful. You can easily put it in your bag or pocket and carry it around all day. Compared to other models with the same specifications, SMARTCOBY Pro is the smallest you can buy while maintaining a high output.

 

 

 

Because of its small size, it can be used not only for charging smart devices but also for other wearable applications such as electric heating vests and clothes with built-in fans.

 

 

SMARTCOBY Pro is palm-sized but its capacity is 10000mAh, which lets it charge your smartphone device more than once.

 

 

 

You can check the remaining battery life and know when you need to recharge the SMARTCOBY Pro just by looking at the digital display.

 

 

 

Have you ever needed to use a portable charger, but found the battery was dead?

The SMARTCOBY Pro 30W has a pass-through function that allows you to charge your phone and charger battery at the same time. You do not have to worry about which one you should charge first.

 

 

We used LG's INR 21700 battery cell, the same one used in Tesla vehicles. The high energy density and high compression of the battery cell enabled us to make our charger smaller while keeping its high output.

 

 

1 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W

  • $32　-　Launch Special (21% off)  SOLD OUT
  • $33　-　Super Early Bird (19% off)　 SOLD OUT
  • $35　-　Early Bird (14% off)　
  • $37　-　Indiegogo Special (9% off)　

 

2 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W

  • $65　-　Early Bird: Pair Set (20% off)

 

4 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W

  • $125　-　Early Bird: Family Set (23% off)

 

You can save more money if you buy together with your friends and family.

 

Expected Retail Price

  • $41  　-　1 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W
  • $82  　-　2 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W
  • $164　-　4 x SMARTCOBY Pro 30W

 

  • Charging Cable (Choose one from the list below.)

　　- USB-C to Lightning Cable (MFi Certified)  1m

　　- USB-A to USB-C (Quick Charge Supported)  1m

　　- USB-A to Lightning (MFi Certified) 1m

　　- USB-C to USB-C Cable  (eMaker Supported) 1m

 

  • 3C1A wall charger (Swift Charge)

Swift Charge, which was also launched on the Japanese crowdfunding site "GREENFUNDING," is available as an add-on option. Swift Charge is a GaN charger that supports simultaneous charging of up to four devices and can charge three USB-C devices simultaneously at max  20W each.

 

Even if you are using 2 ports of Swift Charge to charge your phone or tablet, you can always charge an additional SMARTCOBY Pro.

It is designed to be as small as possible so that it can fit in the palm of your hand, and is made of rubber material that is comfortable to the touch and easy to carry around every day.

 

 

 

2020

  • April　Initial idea for "The World's Smallest Portable Charger"
  • May　Functional design (input/output requirements & port design) , product size estimation
  • July　Exterior design
  • August　Created a sample on a 3D printer
  • September　PCB Design T1
  • November　Changed the power output design from 27W to 30W with the release of M1 MacBook Air, PCB design T2
  • December　Pre-production sample & final exterior modifications

2021

  • January　Product function modifications
  • February　 Mass-production (1st batch)
  • March　Mass-production (2nd batch)
  • April　Shipping to the US fulfillment center
  • May　Shipping out to Supporters

SMARTCOBY, a credit-card-sized power bank that has been supported by over 1,000 people on Makuake, a Japanese crowdfunding site. SMARTCOBY has upgraded and become "SMARTCOBY Pro 30W," with higher output!

CIO was founded by a Shodai, who was born in 1990 in Osaka, Japan. While working for a Japanese IT company as a new graduate in 2011, he started importing and using gadgets from overseas to make his work environment and daily life more convenient.

But as he started using these foreign tools more, he realized how limited each device was, and that he had to own multiple chargers to power up his laptop, smartphone, music player, etc. As a result, he had more devices than he knew what to do with, and was constantly wasting time looking for the right charger for the right device. 

Realizing that other people must be having the same problem, Shodai starting thinking about how to combine multiple functions in a single product, while also using the latest technology. When he couldn’t find such devices elsewhere, he decided to start manufacturing his own products. 

With this idea in mind, CIO was established in 2017 as a manufacturer dedicated to creating devices that would set new standards of multi-functionality while also using the most advanced technologies. 

CIO started out selling its products exclusively on Japanese e-commerce sites, but has expanded and now services a wide range of major Japanese electronics retailers, home centers, and supermarkets, and more than one million people have now used our products.

Our next goal is to bring this marriage of multi-functionality and technology from Japan to the rest of the world. And with your help, we are sure we can make this happen!

 

 

 

Cash Back for Referrals

We have started a referral program that allows you to get a unique referral link to share with your friends and family. You can earn commissions for any successful referrals that come through your link.

 

All you have to do is:

1. Visit our sign up page below and sign up 
https://smartcoby-pro-world-s-smallest.kickbooster.me/boost

2. Copy your unique referral link
3. Share the link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!
4. Refer to your dashboard to monitor your referrals and commissions!

If someone backs us through your link, you will get a 10% commission in real cash.

So, please think about someone who would be interested in SMARTCOBY Pro 30W and send the link.

Help boost our campaign from here! 

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production. 

There is a possibility of slight changes of the color in our devices and in the company logos.

If the number of supporters exceeds our expectation, the shipping time may be delayed due to production delays or other reasons in the manufacturing process.


FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep up open and honest communication lines with you throughout the process so you will know where your product is and when it will get to you.

 

OTHER RISKS: If the number of supporters exceeds our expectation and we are able to further improve our mass production system, the regular selling price may be lower than the planned selling price. There is a possibility that similar products exist, so please support us at your own discretion.

The actual color of the product may be different than how it looked in the environment it was filmed in.

September　PCB Design T1

November　Changed the power output design from 27W to 30W with the release of M1 MacBook Air, PCB design T2

December　Pre-production sample & final exterior modifications

2021


January　Product function modifications

February　 Mass-production (1st batch)

March　Mass-production (2nd batch)

April　Shipping to the US fulfillment center

May　Shipping out to Supporters



SMARTCOBY, a credit-card-sized power bank that has been supported by over 1,000 people on Makuake, a Japanese crowdfunding site. SMARTCOBY has upgraded and become "SMARTCOBY Pro 30W," with higher output!
CIO was founded by a Shodai, who was born in 1990 in Osaka, Japan. While working for a Japanese IT company as a new graduate in 2011, he started importing and using gadgets from overseas to make his work environment and daily life more convenient.
But as he started using these foreign tools more, he realized how limited each device was, and that he had to own multiple chargers to power up his laptop, smartphone, music player, etc. As a result, he had more devices than he knew what to do with, and was constantly wasting time looking for the right charger for the right device. 
Realizing that other people must be having the same problem, Shodai starting thinking about how to combine multiple functions in a single product, while also using the latest technology. When he couldn’t find such devices elsewhere, he decided to start manufacturing his own products. 
With this idea in mind, CIO was established in 2017 as a manufacturer dedicated to creating devices that would set new standards of multi-functionality while also using the most advanced technologies. 
CIO started out selling its products exclusively on Japanese e-commerce sites, but has expanded and now services a wide range of major Japanese electronics retailers, home centers, and supermarkets, and more than one million people have now used our products.
Our next goal is to bring this marriage of multi-functionality and technology from Japan to the rest of the world. And with your help, we are sure we can make this happen!
 


 
 
Cash Back for Referrals
We have started a referral program that allows you to get a unique referral link to share with your friends and family. You can earn commissions for any successful referrals that come through your link.
 
All you have to do is:
1. Visit our sign up page below and sign up https://smartcoby-pro-world-s-smallest.kickbooster.me/boost
2. Copy your unique referral link3. Share the link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!4. Refer to your dashboard to monitor your referrals and commissions!

If someone backs us through your link, you will get a 10% commission in real cash.
So, please think about someone who would be interested in SMARTCOBY Pro 30W and send the link.
Help boost our campaign from here! 

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production. 
There is a possibility of slight changes of the color in our devices and in the company logos.
If the number of supporters exceeds our expectation, the shipping time may be delayed due to production delays or other reasons in the manufacturing process.
FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, customs clearance or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep up open and honest communication lines with you throughout the process so you will know where your product is and when it will get to you.
 
OTHER RISKS: If the number of supporters exceeds our expectation and we are able to further improve our mass production system, the regular selling price may be lower than the planned selling price. There is a possibility that similar products exist, so please support us at your own discretion.
The actual color of the product may be different than how it looked in the environment it was filmed in.

story:
NUMBER ZERO 2.0 is the world's very first 5-in-1 magnetic car vent cellphone mount with dynamic animation, which is the upgraded version of NUMBER ZERO 1.0 3-in-1 air freshener! Whether you're talking, navigating, or listening to your favorite music, it holds your device in place securely so that you get a safer, distraction-free driving experience.

As a bonus, you can use the NUMBER ZERO 2.0 as an aromatherapy diffuser to fill your car with the smell of your favorite essential oils or perfume. When not in use, the NUMBER ZERO displays an eye-catching dynamic animation that's sure to add an element of fun to your car interior. It also can be your phone stand when watch movie at table. Last but not least, you can use the device as a hand-held stress reliever to relax at the end of a hard day's work. 

There are 10 different animation kits ready for you to choose! We will send survey after it's closed

How People Talk About NUMBER ZERO?

(Recommended by Good Morning San Diego in "Back to School")

1. 2-in-1 Built-In Car Diffuser: Refresh Your Environment!

Saving for the ultra-strong magnetic phone holder, NUMBER ZERO 2.0 features a built-in car vent mount and interior diffuser. Place a few drops of your favorite essential oils or perfume on the felt pad, place it inside, and enjoy the refreshing smell. Works for stress, anxiety, relaxation, and even for an added boost of energy while you're driving. Refresh your environment and invigorate your mind. 

2. 3-in-1 Animation Design Fit-in, Inspired by Aero-engine!

Our designers included an animated "picture in picture" background to keep you entertained when your NUMBER ZERO 2.0 car phone mount is not in use. This unique image uses "relative movement" technology to create a remarkable animation effect, rotating one time for every 44 fan rotations, whose shape is inspired by Aero-engine, driven by reducer. Choose from one of our many fun designs, or create your own! It's fun and easy.

3. 4-in-1 Stress Relief Toy and Fidget Device: Relax and Have Fun!

Looking for a way to unwind after a stressful day? Our NUMBER ZERO 2.0 phone mount also functions as a stress relief toy / fidget spinner. Enjoy the rotating animation or simply spin the device between your fingers to help you focus. Either way, it's a great toy to take with you, be it at the office or at home.

4. 5-in-1, Built-in Phone Stand: Entertain Yourself Wherever You Go!

Take the NUMBER ZERO 2.0 car phone vent mount with you and use it as a portable phone stand. Simply attach it to the back of your device, and place it wherever you want. Watch videos, listen to music, or enjoy a hands-free video call – you'll find tons of uses for this helpful feature. It can also help you take better photos!

1. Supports 360° Rotation: Get the Display You Need!

 

The NUMBER ZERO 2.0 features a solidly built, integrated structure that lets you rotate your smartphone a full 360 degrees! Swivel your display to get it in the perfect position while navigating, listening to music, or talking on the phone. From vertical to horizontal to anywhere in between, you can always get the position you need.

2. Ultra-Strong Magnet: No More Falling Phones!

It features a powerful built-in magnet that's capable of securely holding 10 iPhone 12s at once! This means that your phone will remain in place no matter the weather, road conditions, or driving situation. From speed bumps to sudden stops to rugged mountain roads, our full-cycle built-in magnet technology will provide you with a steady display.

Even after 25,000 miles of driving, our phones haven't moved an inch! That's because the magnetic force we use is 6x stronger than any other car phone mount on the market. And despite its power, the magnet doesn't interfere with the phone signal or charging efficiency one bit.

3. Fit for All, No More MagSafe for iPhone 12 Series!

The NUMBER ZERO 2.0 car phone mount can firmly hold most cellphones and even some mini tablets! In fact, with the iPhone 12 series' built-in magnets, you can use the mount without attaching the magnetic plate! For other models, simply stick our special magnet on the back of your phone or phone case. It couldn't be easier! 

4. Non-scratching Design: Protect Your Car's Interior

Our NUMBER ZERO 2.0 car phone vent mount has a smart, "Non-scratching" design to protect the surfaces of your car. The soft rubber grip is covered by a layer of silicon that will never damage the car vent. It can also be plugged in and taken out thousands of times without losing its grip! We've also invested in high-tech 3M glue for the alloy surface of the mount, which protects your phone from being scratched as well. 

5. Non-screw Design: Easy to Install and Remove

The "Non-screw"design of our NUMBER ZERO 2.0 has been mechanically assembled by mechanical design integrally formed. It takes just one second and one hand to install or remove. It couldn't' be easier. 

 

1. Drive Safer: Protect Your Vehicle and Your Family

You don't need to worry about it taking up too much space in your vehicle with the NUMBER ZERO 2.0. It will also not block the dashboard or your view. Thanks to the vent mount functionality, you can place it in your field of vision while keeping your eyes on the road. 

2. Easy DIY Modifications: Create Unique Gifts and Styles

We've designed the NUMBER ZERO 2.0 so that you can easily customize the animated background. Simply remove the back clip and take out the current design, then create one of your choice. It's a great way to give a meaningful gift to friends and family. 

3. High-End Premium Packaging: A Great Gift for Anyone

Our double-layered top and bottom packaging keeps the NUMBER ZERO 2.0 safe from compression, deformation, or other damage. What's more, all of the sponge inside the package is made of the high-quality electronic cotton. Not only does it perfectly secure the device, but it is environmental-friendly, odor-free, and non-slagging.

4. Just Add Essential Oils: Create a Car Aromatherapy Diffuser

We provide three blank felt pads along with each new NUMBER ZERO 2.0.This allows you to add your favorite essential oil or perfume and turn your device into a vent-mounted aromatherapy diffuser. 2-3 drops can last for a whole week!

 

1. Sophisticated Craftsmanship Delivers a Luxury Appearance

We use state-of-the-art technology and expert craftsmanship to ensure our animated car phone holder achieves the highest industrial standard level. Our four-part process includes:

  • Die Casting: Creates perfect, uniform shapes
  • CNC Fine Fishing: Fit all parts together tightly and precisely
  • Polishing: Polishes the parts to the quality of high-end watches
  • Electroplating: This allows for a better gloss while adding an extra layer of anti-scratch and anti-corrosion protection.

2. Premium Material Meets High Quality

Save for the magnets themselves, each NUMBER ZERO 2.0 is constructed using only the most sophisticated parts:

  • Durable Body: Shaped out of highly durable solid zinc alloy
  • Anti-Slippage Vent Clip: Silicone covered metal, which is anti-slip and provides a strong grip
  • Self-Lubricating POM: The inner animation device uses self-lubricating POM plastic gears
  • Reliable Micro Bearings: Made of industrial stainless steel, these are factory assembled and precision processed to ensure smooth function.
  • Anti-fading, Waterproof, and Anti-deformation Package: All packaging is designed with advanced matte silver plates for a higher quality, anti-fading, waterproof, and anti-deformation result.

Support us today, you will get it before Christmas!

MR. WU, is an accomplished designer who has worked in the Industrial Design Industry for decades. During that time, he has been granted a number of honors from organizations like CES, IF Design, RedDot Design, and more. Now he wants to bring the industrial quality and design to commercial market, everyone can enjoy the beauty of industrial design.

Two years ago, MR. WU started up his own brand, which he called NUMBER ZERO. ZERO means nothing, of course, but it is also the beginning of everything. Not only is this a reference to the Chinese pronunciation of WU, but it also encapsulates MR. WU's design theory.

His goal was to create something that can be used by everyone with only minor superficially changes. However, he also wanted sophisticated design elements inside. This led to the creation of this magnetic car phone holder.

Combining art with technology, MR. WU added animation to some common gadgets, creating a dynamic piece of art that could dynamically elevate one's space. Unfortunately, things were much harder than anticipated, and he failed more than 100 times trying to accomplish the best effect. If the driving fan moved too fast, the animation would become a blur. If it went too slow, the animation wouldn't look right.

Eventually, MR. WU found that 44:1 was the perfect ratio, testing it thousands of times. Two years later, MR. WU is ready to mass-produce his unique magnetic car phone holder and is attempting to raise money to do so. MR. WU believes crowdfunding is the best way to raise money and a good platform for communicating with customers while showcasing the product worldwide. In return for investment, NUMBER ZERO will offer discounted rates to those who believe in the product.

We're already on production stage, please help us to move to the next level- massive production. We will try our best to ship the product before Christmas!

 

Thanks for your support! We reached the goal within 15 minutes, now the first stretch goal is live.

Click the following buttons to help us reached the goal - $10,000, everyone can get extra animation kit - Christmas series for FREE! That would be the best Christmas gift for your families or friends!

1. Share on Facebook

2. Share on Twitter

We provide multiple ways to communicate with NUMBER ZERO directly:

1. you can leave comments or send private messages from Indiegogo backstage

2. you can email us via marketing@numberzero.net [recommended]

3. you can join the online community to chat online [recommended] here:

 

(click the image to join directly, or visit members.numberzero.net)

4. you can reach us via social channels as follow:

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wunumberzero
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/wunumberzero
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wunumberzero/
